She approves of mankind's avarice, allowing their wastefulness and extravagance, and so commends the struggles of her Master.

She has acknowledged her Master as a partner worthy of mounting a beast such as herself, and therefore holds nothing back when wielding the full power of her claws and fangs.

Nevertheless, as she is closer to her original nature, if you do not spoil her adequately, her mood will turn sour, and once she has starts sulking, her cagey personality makes her a real pain in the ass to deal with.


Arrogant, yet selfless.

Cruel, yet loving.

Sensitive, yet prone to loneliness.

She is the Beast who feasts upon the world of mankind, yet also wishes to journey alongside them. Both the evil of humanity, and the love of humanity.


"It is the incorrect way of the universe that the Beast of Revelation take off from the ground――that the Emperor of Roses burn up as she soars across the cosmos and becomes a brilliant star."


• Her motives / her attitude toward her Master

This is Draco after having built up trust with her Master.

Meaning, unlike her first and second ascensions, Draco's third ascension has her in full flirt-mode.

The original Draco finds the way she acts in her third ascension shameful, and insists that...

"That thing is not me"

"Forget everything immediately; I shall too"
6:
In a certain parallel world,

the Beast of Sodom imitated Goetia's Incineration of Human Order,

giving rise to the 'Testament World',

drawing in innumerable Chaldeas from various other worlds to it.


By assembling the desires of the many Chaldeas,

the Beast of Sodom attained its true form,

but was then defeated by a certain Chaldea,

causing the Testament World to collapse.



In order to bring about her own curtain call,

Draco summoned many Servants to slay her.

It was here that the tale of the Sixth Beast was supposed to have ended.


And yet, at that moment, the destroyed Testament World came in contact with the Chaldea from the "original world", if you could call it that.

The Master of Chaldea was then abducted into the Testament World by the Demon Beast Incarnadines who had rejected their own demise.

It was so that Draco and the Master of Chaldea raised the curtain on the new tale of the Spiral Testament World.


Draco, having passed beyond the thrice setting sun, is a 'what-if' rejected by pan-human history.

The world's cursed route that leads us to our bad ending.

As such, Draco is summoned as her original Beast self.

What meaning does that hold?

What fate does that lead toward?

All answers lie within the tragedies and comedies spun from romance.


Both prayers and curses.

Both wounds and love.

Both the righteous, and the unrighteous.

Drink it all down, and ascend unto the cosmos.

传说中的幻术（外术）使。妖术师。
其本领十分高强，据说甚至能够暂时地令死者以为自己死而复生。
尤其是在上方地区似乎知名度相当高。
虽然也有说法称其为忍者，
但她侍奉着谁，又进行了怎样的活动都尚无定论。

——其左眼，乃是显示魔性的猩红色。
1:
身高／体重：153cm·41kg（人型部分）
出处：『义残后觉』『华鸟百谈』等
地域：日本
属性：中立·恶　　副属性：地　　性别：—
现在的外观是女性（末期型果心居士·女郎蜘蛛），但制作加藤段藏时外表则是男性（中期型果心居士·恶四郎）。原本的肉体性别是什么，果心居士已经不记得了。
2:
静静伫立着的外术使。妖术师。
性格方面稳重而谨慎。

将自己的肉体的各个部分不断渐次替换为机关，最终导致果心居士原本的肉体已经不剩分毫。
“哪块儿地方至少应该还能剩下那么一点吧”——本人就像事不关己一样地这样嘟囔着。

自我同一性与肉体一并缺失的果心居士，
也只得将自己的锚点置于外部。
结果而言，变得要依照他人眼里看来的「自己的样子」来选择行动方式了。
比方说，如果他人在自己身上窥见了「死去的母亲」的些许面影，果心居士便会依照那「死去的母亲」一般来定义自己，并做出相应的举止。

作为英灵被召唤出来的果心居士所包覆在外的面容，
是一位少女。据说她是某位战国武将的妻子，年纪轻轻便与武将阴阳两隔。果心居士直到临终之时，都还使用着这幅面容。

现在这「稳重谨慎的性格」，
也不过是这位少女的再现。
——而果心居士的本质，只留存在那悲伤地眺望着远方的猩红视线之中。
3:
○气息遮断：A
作为Assassin被召唤出来的果心居士，拥有最高阶级的气息遮断技能。
通过精细解析了初代风魔小太郎的忍者之术从而习得了忍术，自己也成为了优秀的忍者。
更进一步说，因为全身基本都是机关，作为生物的气息基本没有残留。

○机关制作：EX
道具作成的亚种技能。
能够随心所欲地制作出远超生前的文明水平的机关（机械装置）。
关于技术核心果心居士不会过多提及，但这也可以说是外术的一种，其高端的技术和制作出的成品已经属于神秘的领域了。
在本作中，果心居士在得到了初代风魔小太郎的协力的基础上制作出的「机关忍者」，正是加藤段藏其人。

○一眼知何处：B
果心居士已经失却了自己的真实身份。
以幻术和机关打造而出的这具身躯，始终包覆着「对谁人而言的重要之人」的面容，能够钝化敌人的刀刃，而活化友方。
在本作中基本没有使用（现在出于不让御主及其周身陷入混乱的考量，基本的外观和言行举止都固定为了末期型果心居士）。
4:
○幻术（外术）：EX
果心居士乃是传说级别的幻术使，有说法称其轻而易举地戏耍了驰名天下的战国武将。
作为精神攻击来运用的话，能够给对象带来致命的效果。将幻术与机关相组合的话，甚至能够压制庞大的军势。
果心居士本人中意用日本的古典说法「外术」或是「外法」来称呼它。

○杀戮机巧：B+
与杀戮技巧似是而非的技能。
针对所开发出的机关（机械装置）有意识地付与其杀戮用途。在本作中，通过启动与自身相组合的战斗用机关，能够提升战斗力。

○魔眼：B
果心居士的左眼，是持有能够束缚对象行动的机能的魔眼。通过与幻术（外术）技能结合使用，能够倍增其暗示效果。
这只魔眼，似乎就是于果心居士而言唯一还留存着的「肉身」的部位。
据本人称，好像「感觉眼力不如以前了」，可以认为其本来应该能有A阶级的水准。
5:
『机关外法·狮子奋迅』
阶级：B　种类：对人/对军宝具
有效范围：0～40　最大捕捉：1人/50人

Karakurigehou Shishifunjin。
同时使用魔眼和机关的杀人绝技。
用无暇抵抗的怒涛攻势杀戮对象。

首先，扩大变形为与体型高大而持有多足的「女郎蜘蛛」近似的模式。
通过解放魔眼来束缚对象，
使其陷入无防备的状态，再将秘藏的战斗机关武装同时并列启动。
展开与加藤段藏所使用的事物所属同一系统的机关导弹等等大火力攻击，并藉由多足进行斩切攻击，歼灭敌性存在。

实际上，在收尾时还会发动后文所述的宝具『妖术斩法・瓠瓜』，将对象斩首作结。

　　◆
  
『妖术斩法·瓠瓜』
阶级：C　种类：对人宝具
有效范围：0～30　最大捕捉：1人

Youjyutsuzanpou Hisago。
绝技兼幻术之一种，惨无人道的杀人妖术。
将拿在手中的果实视作对象，斩之。对象的首级也会随之斩落。
加藤段藏所修习的第二宝具『妖术斩法・夕颜』（军事学论著『北越军谈』中段藏所使用的技法）的原型。
在本作中，果心居士便是这门妖术真正的使用者，而将自己的技术搭载到了加藤段藏身上。
另外，据说这门绝技，是在果心居士还没有把自己的身体替换成机关之前……在还是肉身之躯，双眼都还是猩红色的时候就修习的技术。
6:
虽然对于几乎完全失去了自我的果心居士来说，即便成为了英灵，表情和感情也依然难以联系在一起，已经是一种特征了……

但在迦勒底被召唤出来的果心居士，
因为结下了在伊莉雅城所发生的种种的缘分，已经将表情和感情之间的联系原模原样保留下来了。

——所以。在感到喜悦的时候，也能够为此而温柔地微笑了。

A legendary user of illusions (gejutsu). A sorcerer. Their skill with it was so tremendous that it convinced people they could temporarily revive the dead. They seem to be considerably famous in the Kyoto-Osaka region. Some say they were a ninja, but there's no consensus on who they served and what they did as one.


―――The deep scarlet of her left eye is a mystic mark.
1:
Height/Weight: 153 cm / 41 kg (humanoid portions)

Source: Gizan Kōkaku, Kachō Hyakudan, among others

Region: Japan

Alignment: Neutral Evil

Attribute: Earth

Gender: ―

Their current appearance is a woman (Kashin Koji Last Model: Jorōgumo) but the appearance they took when they built Danzō was a man (Kashin Koji Midstage Model: Akushirō). Which was the gender of Kashin Koji's original flesh body is not registered in her memory.
2:
A quiet user of gejutsu. A sorcerer. Calm and reserved personality.


After replacing parts of their body with mechanical puppet parts bit by bit, ultimately there were barely any parts of Kashin Koji's original flesh body left. "There must Be at least oNnNe part leFt", she says if this was not her problem.


As Kashin Koji was losing their identity in the process of losing their body, he had no choice but to rely on external support to define himself. Consequently, he came to choose actions based on what others saw him as. For example, if someone noticed Kashin Koji resembled their dead mother, she would define herself as the dead mother and behave as she would.


Kashin Koji's visage as a summoned Heroic Spirit is that of one specific girl. She was the wife of a Sengoku general separated from him by a young death. She is the face Kashin Koji wore until her death.


Her current "calm and reserved" personality is merely a replica of the girl. ―All left of Kashin Koji's original essence is in the deep scarlet gaze melancholically staring far away.
3:
• Presence Concealment: A

Kashin Koji summoned as an Assassin possesses the highest rank of the Presence Concealment Skill. She learned ninjutsu by meticulously analyzing the first Fūma Kotarō's shinobi arts, thus also becoming a competent ninja. Furthermore, she's mostly all machinery, so barely has any traces of life.


• Karakuri Construction: EX

A variant of the Item Crafting Skill. She can freely create karakuri (machines) far transcending her era's civilization level. Kashin Koji avoids speaking at length about the roots of her technology, but the products of her advanced engineering and craftsmanship are a form of gejutsu, thus within the arcane realm. The "karakuri shinobi built with the first Fūma Kotarō's collaboration" mentioned in-story refers to Katō Danzō.


• One Eye Lost Somewhere: B

Kashin Koji forgot who she was. Her body made of machinery and illusion is always wearing the face of someone loved by another, which dulls enemy blades and motivates allies. Not used in-game (To avoid confusing her Master and affiliates, she's keeping her appearance and personality fixed as Kashin Koji's last model).
4:
• Illusion (Gejutsu): EX

Kashin Koji is a legendary illusionist, known for making fools out of the most famous Sengoku generals. This Skill can prove fatal if used as a mental attack. It's even possible for her to overpower a large army by combining illusions and machinery. Kashin Koji personally prefers calling her illusion magecraft by the outdated Japanese terms "gejutsu" and "sotonori".


• Apparatus for Slaughter: B+

Not to be confused with the Aptitude for Slaughter Skill. The karakuri (machines) she develops have intentionally included slaughter purposes. In-game, she boots up her combat machinery to increase her battle capabilities.


• Mystic Eyes: B

Kashin Koji's left eye is a Mystic Eye that restrains the target's movements. When used in conjunction with the Illusion (Gejutsu) Skill, it can double the effects of hypnosis. This Mystic Eye was the only portion left of Kashin Koji's living flesh. She claims her eyes are worse than they used to be, so it's believed this Skill was supposed to be ranked A.
5:
Karakuri Gehō: Shishifunjin (''Karakuri Gehō: Fierce As A Lion'')

Rank: B

Type: Anti-Unit/Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 1-40

Max Targets: 1 person/50 persons

A superhuman murder technique performed through the simultaneous use of her Mystic Eye and machinery. She slaughters her target(s) with a tempestuous attack that leaves no room for resistance.


First, she expands to a form resembling a huge multi-armed jorōgumo. She restricts her opponent with her Mystic Eye, and once they're rendered immobile, she simultaneously turns on all of her secret mechanical combat armaments lined up in organized rows. The waves of high firepower attacks (from the same brand as the karakuri missiles Danzō uses) are accompanied by slashing attacks performed by the many arms, exterminating enemy forces.


And the finisher is beheading the opponent by activating Yōjutsu Zanpō: Hisago, the Noble Phantasm listed below.


◆


Yōjutsu Zanpō: Hisago (''Sorcery Decapitation: Melon Gourd'')
Rank: C

Type: Anti-Unit Noble Phantasm

Range: 0-30

Max Targets: 1 person

A form of illusion, a superhuman technique, and a most merciless murder sorcery. She associates her target with a fruit in her hands and cuts it off. This causes the target's head to fall off. The original version of Danzō's second Noble Phantasm Yōjutsu Zanpō: Yūgao (the technique Danzō uses in Hokuetsu Gundan). In-story, Kashin Koji is the true user of this sorcery and installed Danzō with his technique. Side note: this superhuman technique is one Kashin Koji learned before replacing their body with machinery... in their living flesh, back when the deep scarlet pupils occupied both of their eyes.

印度古代叙事诗「摩诃婆罗多」中的主要登场人物之一。般度五子中的次子，也是阿周那的兄长。

作为风神伐由之子降生，在五子之中拥有
尤其突出的优秀肉身能力。
有着降伏了食人罗刹的传说，还有和同为风神之子的哈奴曼对峙过的轶事，直到今天在印度也是「刚力无双」「有力气」的代称。

和外表印象一致的饭量很大，但烹饪的手艺也相当不错。
当他面临不得不隐姓埋名生活一年的状况时，就去当了宫廷厨师。
1:
身高／体重：191cm·90kg
出处：摩诃婆罗多
地域：印度
属性：秩序·善　　副属性：天　　性别：男性
饭还请不要客气尽管加。
2:
也被称为Bhimsen（梵语भीमसेन，即“拥有令人畏怖之军势者”）。
是贡蒂通过向风神伐由献上祝祷（Mantra）从而诞下的孩子，在他诞生时，天边传来了「这个孩子将会成为强者中的至强者」的声音。
在般度五子中拥有尤其突出的，优秀的物理、肉体力量，也非常擅长棍棒和空手搏斗。

在他将令人们苦不堪言的罗刹希丁波击败的故事中，希丁波的妹妹希丁芭爱上了怖军。
对此十分焦急不安的希丁波袭击了怖军，
却被怖军十分干脆的反杀了。
剩下的就只有同为罗刹的女人希丁芭。
怖军本想让她重蹈其兄的覆辙，但在长兄坚战的劝说下，最终（有条件地）接纳了她。
也就是「白天在她身边生活，到了晚上就返回」。
结果，二人诞下了强大的罗刹之子瓶首，在之后的大战中也在般度的一边作战。
3:
○婆苏吉的灵药：A
过去，怖军曾被憎恨他的持国百子（难敌）下毒，并扔进了河流中。
但他却漂流到了蛇之世界，并因为受蛇啮咬，体内的毒素得到中和从而复活。
更甚者，据说他还从蛇之王婆苏吉处得到了「喝下去就能获得力量」的灵药，将之一饮而尽，回到了兄弟们的身边。

○棍棒之术：A
师承俱卢族的武术师傅德罗纳（马嘶之父）和英雄大力罗摩的棍棒之术。
被称颂为刚力无双的怖军，尤其在棍法和棒法的领域显示出了他的才能。
并不局限于通常印象中的「棍棒」，而是可以适应所有棒状武器的武术技能。

即便是手边生长的树木，对怪力之怖军而言也能成为出色的武器。
4:
○哈奴曼之咆哮：EX
领受了猿猴之神哈奴曼的加护的大咆哮。
哈奴曼与怖军同为风神伐由之子，也就是说，是怖军的兄长。

怖军为了摘取妻子黑公主想要的花，通过吹螺号、呐喊等方式在森林里闹出了很大的动静。
森林里听到响动的动物们陷入了巨大的混乱，而睡着的的哈奴曼只是打了个呵欠，又动了动尾巴，就发出了足以盖住怖军的更大的声响。
此后，面对拦路的哈奴曼，一无所知的怖军强硬地要他让路。
哈奴曼便回答，「想过去的话，把这尾巴抬起来再过吧」，而即便是号称刚力无双的怖军，也没能抬起哈奴曼的尾巴。
之后，怖军便为自己的骄傲自大感到羞耻，和哈奴曼建立了良好的关系。
5:
『风神之子，在此』
阶级：B　种类：对人/对军宝具
有效范围：—　最大捕捉：1人

Maruti Vayuputra
真名的两个词意思都是「风神的儿子」。
以风神伐由的所有物，白色的旗枪为媒介，将寄宿于自己身体内部的神性活性化的宝具。
掀起伐由的暴风，将其压缩并披挂于身。筋力、敏捷的参数都会飞跃式提升，还能够发挥出针对飞行道具的强大防御性能。
本就是刚力无双的怖军的肉体，再附上伐由的风的话，
那就已经不能算是单个的英雄了，而是等同于单枪匹马就能覆灭一个军队的兵器。

原本的话，也应该能够将这风向外部喷射，但不知道是因为不擅长呢，还是有意识封印了呢，基本不会将其作为飞行道具使用。
（会有肉弹攻击的余波产生的风吹来）

伐由的风也有曾经吹飞了喜马拉雅山脉的一部分，
并将其吹落海中形成了斯里兰卡岛的传说。
6:
般度五子在坚战的赌局中几乎连妻子黑公主都要输掉时，站在对立面的难敌对她露出大腿，以此来侮辱她。
此举激怒了怖军，他宣言「如果爆发战争，我一定会用棍棒把你那大腿敲个粉碎」。
后来的俱卢大战中，怖军与难敌便以棍棒一对一单挑。
原本在决斗中，攻击对手的肚脐以下部位是违反规则的，但据说在势均力敌的胶着中，怖军（在阿周那的提醒下）回想起了自己的宣言，
以棍棒击打难敌的大腿，从而打倒了难敌。

虽然这些不过是传说中的说法，
正确的事实究竟为何尚无定论……
但至少，在『虚数罗针内界 平面之月』中的怖军，因为受到由在大战前伪装成厨师的时代生成的自我片断——『侍奉的Alterego』的影响，没有关于这个结局的记忆。即便铭刻在灵基的最深处，也无法与之相连。

身在迦勒底的怖军当然是记得这场决斗的。不过，他并不怎么愿意提起。
如果说“无论如何都想听”，打算这样更进一步询问的话，就需要做好相应的觉悟了吧。
毕竟这就和向阿周那询问迦尔纳的结局是差不多的。

A major character in the ancient Indian epic, the Mahabharata. He is the second son of the five Pandava princes, as well as Arjuna's older brother.


Born as the son of the wind god Vayu, Bhima is the most physically gifted out of the five princes.

Legends of him include exterminating rakshasa who feast on humans, and challenging Hanuman, a fellow child of the wind god. To this day in India, his name is synonymous with "unrivaled in strength" and "mighty."


Although he is as gluttonous as he looks, he is also quite skilled at cooking.

Back when he had to spend a year hiding his true identity, he worked as a court cook.

Region: India

Keep the helpings coming.
2:
Also known as Bhimasena.

He was born after Kunti offered a mantra to the wind god Vayu. At the time of his birth, a voice could be heard from the heavens saying, "This child shall be the strongest among the strong." Out of the five princes, he is considered to have the greatest physical and bodily strength, and excels in maces and hand-to-hand combat.


In the legend about the cruel rakshasa Hidimba, Hidimba's sister Hidimbi falls in love with Bhima.

Infuriated, Hidimba attacks Bhima, but Bhima turns the tables on him and kills the rakshasa.

All that remains is the rakshasi of the same blood.

Bhima wanted her to follow her brother's footsteps, but with his eldest brother Yudhishthira's recommendation, he eventually accepted Hidimbi (to an extent).

She would live her previous life during the day, and come back at night.

As a result, a powerful rakshasa child named Ghatotkacha was born between them, who later fought for the Pandavas in the Kurukshetra War.
3:
'''• Vasuki's Elixir: A

Bhima was once poisoned by the Kauvaras (Duryodhana) who detested him, and he was swept down the river.

However, he reached the world of naga, and as a result of their bites, the poison in his body was neutralized and he was revived.

He was also given an elixir by Vasuki, the Naga king, who said, "Drink this and it will give you strength." He gulped it down and returned to his brothers.


• Lathi khela: A'''

The art of maces that Bhima learned from the Kuru clan's military arts instructor Drona (Ashwatthaman's father) and the hero Balarama.

Bhima, said to be unrivaled in strength, was particularly talented in the art of maces.

A military arts skill that can be applied to all weapons shaped like a stick, and not just limited to the commonly envisioned mace.


Even the trees that grow in the area make excellent weapons for the monstrously strong Bhima.
4:
• Hanuman Howling: EX

A great howl blessed by the monkey god Hanuman.

Hanuman is also the son of the wind god Vayu, meaning he is Bhima's older brother.


Bhima, who went to the forest to pick the flowers his wife Draupadi asked for, created a loud ruckus in the forest using his conch and his cries.

The animals of the forest were thrown into disarray hearing this, but all the sleeping Hanuman did was yawn, then move his tail to make a loud noise that drowned out Bhima's cacophony.

Afterwards, Bhima unaware that Hanuman had blocked the way, haughtily demanded that Hanuman yield to him.

"If you wish to pass, lift up my tail and pass through," Hanuman replied, but even Bhima with his unrivaled strength could not lift up Hanuman's tail.

Bhima was ashamed of his own arrogance, and the two brothers developed a good relationship after.

"Child of the Wind God, Here I Stand"

Rank: B

Type: Anti-Personnel / Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: --

Maximum targets: 1 person


Maruti Vayuputra.

Both words mean "son of the wind god."

A Noble Phantasm that activates the divinity that resides within Bhima, through the white banner lance belonging to the wind god Vayu as an intermediary.

It creates a gale of vayu, which then is compressed and covers the body. Strength and agility stats are dramatically improved, and also acts as a strong defense against projectiles.

If Bhima's already unrivaled body were to be cloaked in Vayu's wind, he would no longer be just an individual hero, but a weapon capable of destroying an entire army by himself.


Normally, it should be possible to unleash the wind outwards, but Bhima doesn't really use it for flying. Perhaps he isn't very good at it, or perhaps he is consciously avoiding its use.

(The wind can come as an aftershock of a human bullet attack).


It is said that the Vayu winds once blew away part of the Himalayas, which fell into the sea and became the island of Lanka.
6:
The five brothers were about to lose their wife to Yudhishthira's gamble when Duryodhana, his opponent, insulted her by revealing her thigh. This infuriated Bhima, who declared, "Should a war arise, I will crush your thighs with my mace."

Later during the Kurukshetra War, Bhima and Duryodhana fought a one-on-one battle using their maces.

Normally, it would be against the rules to attack below the waist during a duel, but in the midst of an evenly-matched stalemate, Bhima remembered his declaration (as hinted by Arjuna) and struck Duryodhana's thighs with his mace to defeat him.


That is how the legend goes, although it's hard to say what the actual truth may be...

At any rate, Bhima in the "Inner World of the Imaginary Number Compass Paper Moon", was unable to remember how this legend concluded due to the effects of being an alter ego fragment - "The Alter Ego of Altruism" - as a result of his time pretending to be a cook before the war. Despite the memory being deeply engraved into his Spirit Origin, he was unable to access it.

Bhima in Chaldea, of course, remembers this duel. But he doesn't like talking much about it.

If you insist on asking and try to press further, you had best prepare yourself.

It would be akin to asking Arjuna about Karna's end.

难敌是印度古代叙事诗「摩诃婆罗多」中的主要登场人物之一。是与阿周那、怖军等般度五子对立的持国百子的长兄。

他的母亲从圣仙处获授了「能产百子」的祝福，但最终生下来的却是一个肉块。传说圣仙将之分为100份，装入100只壶中，便从中生出了100个男孩。

难敌与般度五子屡屡生出不和，还与舅舅共同策划了
导致他们被流放到王国之外的赌博骗局。
而后，他也没有接纳流放结束归来的般度五子，引发了把一族之人都卷入其中的俱卢大战。

难敌虽然是连奎师那都认可的战士、棍棒之术的达人，最终却在与怖军的单挑中落败，
在向马嘶交代了后事之后便死去了。
1:
身高／体重：190cm·90kg

地域：印度
属性：秩序·恶　　副属性：地　　性别：男性
奉行“兄弟矛盾与己无关”的主义。
2:
般度五子中的长子坚战德才兼备，被认为是下一任国王的候选，因此难敌便将以他为首的般度五子视为眼中钉。
不仅试图暗杀般度五子中的次子、怪力无双的怖军，还用易燃的材料来建造般度五子的居所，企图放火把他们全部烧死，但都以失败告终。

某一天，在举办于王族面前展露武艺的仪式时，阿周那等人表现出极为优异的技艺，难敌对他们的憎恶和嫉妒因此达到了顶峰。而迦尔纳当即走上众目睽睽之下，发起了对阿周那的挑战。
迦尔纳以精彩的武艺挫败了般度五子的锐气，难敌也因为能与震惊了五子的迦尔纳在同一阵营而感到欢喜。
虽然迦尔纳还更进一步，要求与阿周那决斗，但由于他与身为王族的阿周那身份有别，决斗未被准许。于是，难敌对这一决议提出了异议，并表示“既然身份有别，就由自己来让迦尔纳称王吧”，授予了迦尔纳一国之王的宝座。
这样一来，迦尔纳和难敌就变得亲如一家，在大战当中，迦尔纳也站在了持国百子的一边。
3:
根据俱卢族的长老毗湿摩的裁决，长大成人的般度五子和难敌为首的持国百子将国土一分为二，各自度日。

而后，坚战在获赐的国土上成绩斐然，
作为伟大之王举行了典仪。
而受邀参加这次典仪的难敌却被这场典仪的豪华铺排所压倒，
受诸多的耻辱所扰，再一次因嫉妒而癫狂。
难敌当即与舅舅沙恭尼同谋了以骰子赌博的骗局将般度五子一网打尽的计划。
这一瞄准了坚战嗜赌成性的弱点的计划获得了巨大成功，作为其结果，般度五子输掉了一切。他们被迫要在森林中生活十二年，还要在之后的一年里隐姓埋名。

第十四年，般度五子终于归来，俱卢大战由此爆发——
4:
○恶劣的魅力：B-
显示他所具有的满溢着人格魅力的领袖魅力的技能。
他虽然是极易陷入对他人的嫉妒、歆羡和憎恶的度量狭隘之人，但同时也有着令人无法忽视的魅力。
尽管他的种种恶行和难以褒赏的举止成为了俱卢大战爆发的导火索，但他以俱卢族（持国百子）阵营的领军身份参战，也就意味着愿意追随他的人就是有这么多。
如果说他只是个微不足道的恶棍，也不会有那么多追随者了。
身为俱卢的王族，可以认为他拥有着一定的魅力和受人钦赏的人格。
话虽如此，合不来的家伙就是合不来。

○凶兆的产儿：EX
据说他降生的时候，引发了各种各样不祥的现象。有识之士将他视作一族的灾祸，劝谏国王抛弃这个儿子，但国王并没有接受。
而结果，他引发了给一族带来灭顶之灾的大战。
另外，他也被认为是恶魔迦利的化身。
5:
『由一而生的百王子』
阶级：A　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：1～50　最大捕捉：100人

Jai Kaurava
意为“俱卢（持国百子）的胜利”“俱卢万岁”。
以持国与甘陀利的一众子嗣也即持国百子的长兄的身份，将自同一个肉块中生出的百位王子们一齐召唤出来的宝具。
既然同为自肉块中诞生者，难敌与弟弟们在灵性层面上便也可以说是同一存在。
利用那份联系强行召唤出来的，由武装的王子们构成的一支军队。
其中虽有难降、奇耳等赫赫有名的人物，但也并非是像征服王的军势一样每个人都是有名的英雄。即便如此，他们也是在古老的时代，在神话的大战中战斗的人物，是与般度五子和难敌一样修习了武艺的战士。藉由因血缘的牵绊而展现出的极高的连携配合能力，大多数敌人都能靠数量碾压过去。

另外，虽然有程度的差别，但持国百子的性格基本都和难敌相似。
也就是说基本就是混子集团。
6:
目盲的国王持国与甘陀利之间诞下的，除了100个兄弟，还有仅有1个的女孩。
她的名字是杜莎罗。
据说，杜莎罗是因为母亲「要是不只有男孩，也有女孩的话该多好」的念想，在圣仙最后准备的第101个肉块中诞生的。

后来，杜莎罗嫁给了信度族的胜车王。
胜车王在俱卢大战时，也站在难敌（持国百子）的一边奋勇作战，但最终却被阿周那取下了首级。

战争过后，阿周那为了马祭仪式（Ashvamedha）巡游各地，因此也到访了信度族的领地。
事态当然演变为了一触即发的紧张情况，但据说在杜莎罗勇敢的恳求下，阿周那终止了战斗。

她的一百位兄弟、丈夫还有夫家的家人都被杀害了。
心中当然是怀有恨意的吧。也肯定会有愤怒的吧。
即便如此，她还是选择了——
终结这憎恨的连锁。

毕竟鲜血，已经流得太多太多了。

Duryodhana is a major character in the ancient Indian epic Mahabharata. The eldest of the Hundred Princes who opposed the Five Princes that Arjuna and Bhima were part of.


The story goes that his mother received a blessing from Sage Vyasa to birth 100 children but what she gave birth to was one flesh blob. Sage Vyasa split it into 100 and put each piece in a jar, and from those, 100 boys were born.


Duryodhana antagonized the Five Princes whenever possible, and conspired with his uncle for the rigged dice game that got them exiled from the kingdom. And after they returned from their period of exile, he refused to accept them, causing the Kurukshetra War, which involved all Kurus.


Duryodhana was a master of the mace and a warrior acknowledged by Krishna, but he was ultimately defeated in a duel against Bhima and died trusting Asvattaman to carry on his will.
1:
Height/Weight: 190 cm / 90 kg

Source: Mahabharata

Region: India

Alignment: Lawful Evil

Attribute: Earth

Gender: Male


A follower of the principle that no one should poke their nose in fights between brothers.
2:
Duryodhana's grudge against the Five Princes started because their eldest Yudhishthira was considered as a candidate for the next king due to his superior virtue and intellect. He tried assassinating the second of the five, the herculean Bhima; tried to scorch them all alive by building their house with easily flammable materials and setting it on fire; among many other things that all ended in failure.


One day, during an event to showcase martial arts prowess to the royals, Duryodhana was overflowing with envy and hatred at Arjuna and his brother's marvelous display of ability. Then Karna appeared before the audience and challenged Arjuna to a showdown. Karna's own marvelous display of ability halted the Five Princes' momentum, and with Karna frustrating the princes, Duryodhana was happy to take him as an ally. Karna continued to demand a duel against Arjuna, but the duel wasn't accepted due to the caste difference between him and the royal Arjuna. That's when Duryodhana protested against the decision and gave Karna the throne of one country, making him a king to remove the caste difference. From hereon, Karna and Duryodhana became friends as close as family, and Karna fought on the side of the Hundred Princes in the War.
3:
Bhishma, the elder of the Kuru people, ruled that the five grown Pandava brothers and Duryodhana's Hundred Princes should split the territory in half and live separately.


Eventually, the land given to Yudhishthira prospered and he held a grandiose coronation ceremony. The invitee Duryodhana was overwhelmed by the ceremony's lavishness, felt all sorts of shame and was once again driven mad by envy. That was when he conspired with his uncle Shakuni and plotted to take away everything the Five Princes had in a game of dice. The plan exploited Yudhishthira's weakness (his fixation on gambling) with remarkable success, resulting in the Five Princes losing everything. They were forced to live 12 years in a forest, then one more year in anonymity.


They returned in the 14th year, and that's what broke out the Kurukshetra War.
4:
• Charisma of Relatable Vice: B-

The Skill that represents his charisma overflowing with human weakness.

He's a petty man quickly prone to envy, jealousy, and hatred, but at the same time, has a charm that makes it impossible to leave his side.

Despite the trigger for the Kurukshetra War being the consequences of his many evil and unrespectable actions, he only fought in the war as the face of the Karauva faction because he had enough people taking his side for it.

If he was just a small-time ne'er-do-well, he wouldn't have this many people following him.

As a Kuru royal, it's conceivable that he has a base level of charm and an admirable human side.

That said, people who aren't fully affected by it aren't affected at all.


• Child of Inaspiciousness: EX

The story goes that many ominous events happened when he was born. A wise man recommended the king to cast away that child, as he would invite disaster to all Kurus, but the king didn't accept it.

As a result, he caused the great war that doomed the Kurus.

Also, some sources go that he's an avatar of the demon Kali.
5:
Jai Kaurava (Hundred Princes born from one)

Rank: A

Type: Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 1-50

Max. Targets: 100 people


Jai Kaurava means "Kaurava's victory", or "long live the Kaurava".

A Noble Phantasm where the eldest of the Kaurava (the sons of Dhritarashtra and Gandhari) simultaneously summons all the Hundred Princes born out of one flesh blob.

Since they're born from the same flesh blob, Duryodhana and his brothers can be spiritually considered the same person. Exploiting this connection to forcibly call upon them, a squadron of armed princes is formed.


Among them, there are famed names such as Duhshasana and Vikarna, but much like in Ionioi Hetairoi, not every individual there is a notorious hero. Even then, they're men who fought an epic war in an ancient era and warriors who studied the same martial arts as Duryodhana and the Five Princes. By displaying high coordination brought by their ties of blood, they can overcome most enemies with their numbers.


Side note: A certain level of difference aside, they're generally similar to Duryodhana in personality. Meaning they're fundamentally a gang of good-for-nothings.
6:
In addition to the 100 brothers, the blind king Dhritarashtra and Gandhari also had one girl. Her name was Duhsala. Sage Vyasa felt Duhsala's mother's hope to have a girl instead of all boys, so after everything, he prepared a 101st flesh blob from which she was born.


Later, Duhsala married King Jayadratha of the Sindhava people. At the Kurukshetra War, Jayadratha joined the battle on the side of Duryodhana (Kaurava) and fought hard battles but ultimately had his head taken by Arjuna.


After the war, Arjuna's brothers traveled across every land to perform their Ashvamedha (horse sacrifice), and in that, they visited the lands of the Sindhava people. Although the situation was obviously touchy, Arjuna stopped fighting because of Duhsala's brave supplication.


Her 100 brothers were killed, her husband was killed, and her in-law family was killed. She must have been hateful. She must have been furious. But even then, she made her choice— To end the cycle of hatred.


Far too much blood had already been spilled.

杜尔伽是印度神话中的战争女神。
她是湿婆的神妃、与优雅美丽的女神帕尔瓦蒂被视为同一存在（也有是其另一侧面的说法）。
如今常被描绘成拥有三只眼睛和复数手臂的美丽女性形象。

据说在天界遭到强大魔神袭击之际，从众神忿怒的威光的集合中诞生的便是杜尔伽。
众神将各自持有的三叉戟、环刃、长枪等代表性的武器赠予了她。
据说她以这些神授的武具向魔神发起猛攻，
并在战斗的最后漂亮地将其成功讨伐了。

以某位人类少女作为依凭的，女神杜尔伽的拟似从者。自众神的忿怒中诞生的战斗女神。

杜尔伽是从以湿婆、毗湿奴为首的众神的怒火之光中诞生的存在。
那是为了将袭击天界的魔神摩西沙杀死，出于这一目的，
杜尔伽理所当然地从众神处获授了许多武器。

不论是诞生也好，赠予武具也罢，
众多的神明都是将力量仅仅集中在「制造出杀死魔神之物」这一点上，由此而诞生之物究竟会成为怎样的存在也就可想而知了。

与柔和、优美的女神帕尔瓦蒂完全相对的存在，
专力灭杀魔性之物的，杀戮与战斗的女神。
那便是杜尔伽。
集合了印度教诸神之力制作而出的，
歼灭兵器一般的存在。
3:
身上总是带有一种平静的怒气、清澈的压迫感一样的，让人觉得邪恶之物哪怕只是靠近都会被打飞的氛围。

虽然语气和态度都十分得体，但这就像是「杀魔系统」一样的举止，几乎不会表露出她个人的欲求。
“爱人是帕尔瓦蒂的工作”，她如此认为。（绝非不爱人，不如说是虽然喜欢人类，却会因为职责的不同而不将之表露出来）

表达「任务」这一概念时会使用「神务」一词。

也就是说，“摩诃摩耶（Mahamaya）”也是女神杜尔伽的别名。

「杜尔伽」之名的含义。
也有说法称这原本是魔神的名字，
在以下的神话中也被如是记述：

过去曾有一位魔神，拥有足以流放诸神的伟力。
受到诸神求助的湿婆将处理这一魔神的任务交给了妻子，妻子便生出千余手臂与魔神的军势战斗，甚至将被投掷而来的山峰碎成七块，最后将箭矢打入魔神的胸膛，将其杀死。
因为这份功绩，她夺得了那位魔神的名字，

据说她与仿佛能够覆盖整个世界的光芒一同，以神授的武具对水牛魔神摩西沙发起猛攻，将魔神的军势悉数屠尽。而失去了手下的摩西沙变幻为狮子、人类、大象乃至水牛的姿态与之战斗，

若是解放这个宝具的真名，神授的十件武装的真名也会与之联动，同时解放，湿婆的三叉戟之光、毗湿奴的环刃、因陀罗的雷电等等都会一并活性化，毫不留情地歼灭敌人。

据说是由沉醉于胜利与鲜血当中的迦梨跳起的，唤来末日的舞蹈。
在屠尽了一众魔神之后，因鲜血而迷醉的迦梨
跳起了仿佛要撕裂大地、破碎世界的激烈舞步。
众神请求湿婆让她停下，但尽管湿婆出声阻止，也没能传到迦梨耳中。
于是湿婆便躺到她的脚下，用自己的身体来吸收冲击。
据说因为踩踏了湿婆，迦梨才终于恢复了理智。

以大地震为开端的，大地的终焉，是能够引发人类无法应对的规模的天地异变的宝具。
这一宝具原本并非是出于她的意志，只有在战斗之后才（可能）会自动解放真名。
战斗越是激烈，流血越多，对她来说越是高昂的体验，那么解放真名的概率也就越高。

直到世界破碎，或是她因为魔力耗尽而消失，
再或是她踩中了湿婆之前，这个宝具都不会停止。

因迦勒底的召唤式而现界的迦梨的宝具，虽然名称一致，但因限制枷锁或安全装置的影响而被缩减了规模，内容已经不同了。

Durga is the goddess of war in Hindu mythology.

She is Shiva's divine consort and is viewed the same as (or as another aspect of) the goddess of chastity, Parvati.

She is depicted as a beautiful goddess with a third eye and several arms in modern times.


It is said that Durga was born from the converging of the light of the gods' wrath when a powerful demonic deity assaulted the heavens.

The gods gave her each of their symbolic armaments like a trident, a chakram, a spear etc.

With those god-given armaments, she attacked the demonic deity and at the end of their fight she successfully vanquished him.
1:
Height/Weight: 156cm/46kg

Source: Hindu mythology

Location: India

Alignment: Lawful Neutral

Attribute: Sky

Gender: Female

Her pronouns are "I", "I", and "this goddess".
2:
Using a certain young woman as her host, she became the Pseudo-Servant Durga. The goddess of war born from the wrath of the gods.


Durga is a being born from the light of many gods' wrath, starting from Shiva and Vishnu. Since she came into being for the sake of killing the demonic deity Mahisha who attacked the heavenly realm, for that purpose, she naturally received numerous armaments from the gods.


Since the powers of many gods were concentrated towards the single objective of "creating something that can slay a demon god", one can surmise just what kind of being was born through that process.


Existing as an opposite to the gentle goddess of grace, Parvati, she is the goddess of slaughter and battle who focuses solely on destroying and slaying demonic beings.

That is Durga.

Her existence is akin to that of a weapon of slaughter created by combining the powers of the Indian gods.
3:
She is always clad in a quiet anger and serene air of intimidation, giving off an atmosphere that she would snap at fly at any evil being that approaches her.


Although her tone and behavior are polite, she acts as a "system that kills demons" and rarely shows her personal desires.
Loving mortals is Parvati's job, in her opinion. (It's not that she is incapable of love, on the contrary, she likes mortals, but she tries to not let that show since her and Parvati's roles are different)


"Divine duty" is used with the meaning of "task/mission".
4:
• Mahamaya: EX

Great phantasmal power.

The large phantasmal power serving as the root of magical power was deified as a goddess and even equated with Durga.

In other words, Mahamaya is also another name for Durga.


• The Hard To Approach One: A

This is what the name "Durga" means.

It is said that this was also the name of a demonic deity and myths like the one below are told about it.


Once there existed a demonic deity powerful enough to banish the gods.

Begged for help by the gods, Shiva entrusted his wife with taking care of the problem. She fought the demonic deity's army by creating a thousand arms and even smashes a mountain thrown at her into seven pieces before finally killing the demonic deity by firing an arrow into his chest.

For this achievement, she was said to have usurped the demonic deity's name and called herself Durga.
5:
『O Rage, Desire and Demon-Massacring Goddess』


Rank: EX

Classification: Massacre Noble Phantasm

Range: 1~100

Maximum number of targets: 500


Mahishasuramardini.

It means "slayer of the demonic deity, Mahisha".

The most well-known myth of Durga, the episode where she killed the demonic deity, Mahisha, has been sublimated into a Noble Phantasm.


It is said that along with a light that seemed to cover the whole world, she attacked the water buffalo demonic deity, Mahisha, with her god-granted armaments, and murdered his whole army. According to the legend, Mahisha, who had lost all of his men, fought her while transforming into a lion, a human, an elephant, and even a water buffalo, but was killed by Durga in the end.


When this Noble Phantasm's True Name is unleashed, the True Names of the ten armaments granted to her by the gods are also unleashed at the same time, with the likes of the light of Shiva's trident, Vishnu's chakram and Indra's lightning all activating at once to annihilate the enemy without a shred of mercy.
6:
(Third Ascension)

When Durga fought with the Asura brothers, Chanda and Munda, she also fought with their underlings, the Asuras Sumbha and Nisumbha.

It is said when the enemy approached her, Durga was enraged and a goddess with a fearsome visage appeared from the third eye on her forehead.

In other words, Kali is an existence that was born from the wrath of Durga, who herself was also born from the same emotion.


The goddess of fear, an even more terrifying version of Durga.

The incarnation of massacre and destruction who feasts on the Asura she slays, sipping their blood.

Despite myths like the one above given as her origin, she is also equated with Durga and Parvati, or treated as an even greater goddess of cosmic omnipotence.



『The Dance of Victory That Crushes the World』


Rank: EX

Classification: Anti-World Noble Phantasm

Range: -

Maximum number of targets: -


Samhara Kali.
The dance that calls forth the end of the world done by Kali when she is drunk on victory and blood.
After she was done slaying the Asuras, Kali got drunk off of their blood and began a dance so violent that it split the earth and seemed capable of destroying the world.

The gods asked Shiva to stop her, but even when he called out to Kali, she could not hear him.

So Shiva laid down at her feet and used his body to absorb the impacts of her dance.

By trampling on Shiva, Kali finally regained her sanity.


A Noble Phantasm that causes the demise of the land, such as major earthquakes, and natural disasters on a scale that humanity can not deal with.

Originally, the release of this Noble Phantasm's True Name is done automatically (if possible), but only after the battle has ended, and it isn't something she can activate willingly.

The more intense the battle, the more blood is shed and the more excited Kali gets, the more likely it is for the Noble Phantasm to activate.


Either the world is destroyed, she disappears from running out of mana, or she steps on Shiva; unless any of these happen, this Noble Phantasm will not stop.


The Noble Phantasm of the Kali materialized through Chaldea's summoning system possesses the same name, but due to the effects of a restraint or a safety device, it has been downsized and its contents differ.

据说，当那拥有能把人变成石头的魔眼和蛇发的女妖
被英雄珀耳修斯斩下头颅时，
从流出的鲜血中诞生了两种存在。

其一是生有羽翼的马，珀伽索斯。
而其二，则是「持有黄金剑的怪物」——
1:
身高／体重：160cm·52kg
出处：希腊神话
地域：希腊、无形之岛
属性：混沌·中庸　　副属性：地　　性别：女性
不知为何，看上去比Rider职阶的她要年轻。
2:
美杜莎被珀耳修斯杀害之际，从被斩下的头颅，
或者说从滴落而下的鲜血中诞下了两个存在。
其一是珀伽索斯，而其二则据说是从诞生起就手持着黄金之剑的怪物，克律萨俄耳。
Saber职阶的美杜莎因为这份关联，可以将与克律萨俄耳有着深刻联系的黄金剑作为宝具持有。
克律萨俄耳也被认为是据说拥有三个身体的革律翁和身为众多魔兽之母的厄喀德那的父亲，因此也被称为“怪物之父”。

克律萨俄耳实际的形姿究竟是怎样的，这一问题依然谜团重重。
美杜莎自己也不打算谈及。
是因为是她死后才诞生的存在所以不知道呢，还是虽然知道却保持沉默呢，这一点也不明了。

她只是，好像对待无比珍贵的宝物一般地，凝视着自己手中的这把剑。
3:
○性格
（第二、第三再临）
和Rider职阶的美杜莎基本一致。
虽然沉默寡言而态度淡漠，给人冷淡又冷血的感觉，但对御主十分忠诚。对御主以外的事物基本毫不在意，只不过，若是已经做出并非敌人的判断的话，有时也会展露出温情的一面。
因为有雅典娜因子的作用影响，性质也一定程度上有所偏向，在整体上有更为遗世独立（一直以来的魔物般的冷酷再加上神明般的冷漠）的倾向感。

不过实际上，这也算是她故意表露出的态度。
若是稍有不慎，自己「了无依靠的」「感性的」内在
马上就会表露在言行举止上，她对此有充分的自觉，因此始终抑制着自己的感情。
这其中还有一个理由，那就是雅典娜。
因为雅典娜的气味会从自己身上散发出来，对「自己的起点」以及「自己的结局」怀有热切的感触而十分焦躁。
也就是说，和外表一致，精神层面也有年轻的部分。

另一方面，对于自己的黄金剑，有时会展露出类似「母性」的态度。若是好感度有所上升的情况下，（虽然本人意识不到，但）对待御主的举止也会掺入类似母性的感觉。

（第一再临）
更加强调精神层面上「年轻」的部分，因此也更容易见出感情变化。
也不会使用敬语，对外是一副毫无顾忌、随心所欲的态度。
「因为是工作，是契约，所以我会做」的立场虽然并未改变，但对于产生的不满和疑问和更加坦率，将成熟干练的工作者气质的部分从第二、第三再临中消去的姿态。
反过来说，这也可以算是变得更加平等且容易亲近了。
……她也不是什么擅长交际的人，对人的好恶表现也十分鲜明，所以也不属于和谁都能建立关系的类型就是了。

潜藏于本质中的「母性」并未改变。
就算态度再怎么冷淡，也还是会十分珍惜剑和诞下的怪物们，说不定还会把好感度上升的御主也包含在庇护对象之中呢。
4:
○骑乘：A
能够自如地驾驭除了幻兽、神兽以外的所有野兽、骑乘物。
此外，Saber职阶的她并未持有『骑英之缰绳』。

○自我封印·暗黑神殿：B
Breaker Gorgon
原本是宝具。
拥有能够制造噩梦，以及「封印」的倾向性的结界。
也可以作为封印自己的魔眼的枷锁使用。
作为Rider职阶时戴的眼罩的替代，Saber职阶的她
会戴上太阳镜，或是展开头盔的护眼部分。

○因子捕食（战争女神）：EX
这个美杜莎身上装备着给人以战争女神般的印象的某面盾牌和某副铠甲。
其中详情尚无定论，但据迦勒底分析，这可能就像其他职阶的美杜莎会装备有屠戮不死之镰一样，是因为某种能力而摄入了『与自己的死因接近的要素』的结果也说不定。
5:
『怪物的黄金剑』
阶级：A　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：1~40　最大捕捉：200人

Chrysaor
那是自从死去的美杜莎的鲜血中显现、诞生起就手握黄金剑的存在——身为众多魔兽之祖的「怪物之父」的名字。
而将寄宿了其力量，或者说就是「其本身」的黄金剑进行真名解放的话，连斩击都会附加「怪物之父」的属性。也就是说，这柄剑的真正价值就在于「能够诞生怪物的斩击」「怪物本身一样的斩击」。

一挥之下便会有以黄金之光构筑出形体的怪物（厄喀德那、刻耳柏洛斯等）从剑中诞生，而它们都会如同将黄金剑视作父亲的生物一般顺从地听取命令，或是自动对敌人展开攻袭。
虽然这些黄金的怪物们一段时间后就会如雾般消散，但因为它们本身也可说是剑光的一闪，所以在任意的时机都能够通过黄金的魔力斩击恢复原形。
6:
因众神卑劣的诅咒，而为自己的命运癫狂，
失去了自己曾珍爱的一切，堕落为怪物，
被众望所归的英雄斩落首级的她，
在最后一刻诞下的存在——

珀伽索斯和克律萨俄耳。
驰骋苍穹的天马，和为魔兽之父的怪物。

拥有无边无际的自由的存在，
和能够将血脉无穷无尽延续下去的存在。

或许那就是，在最后落得形单影只的她
所许下的愿望也说不定。

致已经不再的，我曾经无比珍爱的家人。

希望你们能获得自由。
希望你们能永恒延续。

——愿终有一日。

那份自由与永恒，能够再一次，
将我们紧紧相连。

It is said that when Perseus decapitated the female monster with hair made of snakes and eyes that could petrify mortals, two beings were born from her blood.


One was the horse that grew wings, Pegasus.

And the other one was a "monster holding a golden sword"───
1:
Height/Weight: 160cm/52kg

Source: Greek Mythology

Location: Greece, Shapeless Isle

Alignment: Chaotic Neutral

Attribute: Earth

Gender: Female

For some reason, she appears younger than her Rider version.
2:
They say when Medusa was killed by Perseus, two creatures were born from either her neck or the dripping blood.

One of them was Pegasus, and the other was Chrysaor, the monster that bore a golden sword from the moment he was born.

Because of these relations, Saber Medusa possesses the golden sword that is deeply connected to Chrysaor as a Noble Phantasm.

Since Chrysaor is said to have had Geryon, who had three bodies, and Echidna, the mother of countless Demonic Beasts, as his children, he is called the Father of Monsters.


Chrysaor's actual appearance and what kind of existence he was is shrouded in mystery.

Medusa herself also refuses to speak about it.

It is uncertain whether she does not know because he came to be after her death, or whether she does know but remains silent.


She merely gazes at the sword in her hand as if it was a precious treasure.
3:
• Personality

(2nd & 3rd Ascension)

She is almost the same as her Rider version.

Taciturn and unsociable, but while she might appear apathetic and coldhearted, she is devoted to her Master. She is basically indifferent to anyone other than her Master, but if she decides that you are not an enemy, she can show you some kindness.

Due to the Athena factor's influence, she is somewhat dragged along by it, causing the overall direction of her character to be close to otherworldy (a god-like emotionally distant attitude is added to the monster-like emotionally distant attitude).


However, in truth, that is a deliberate behavior on her part.

She is self-conscious about the fact that if she lets her guard down, her "careless" and "sentimental" inner self will become apparent even in her speech and conduct so she restrains her emotions.

The reason for that inner self is also Athena.

Since Athena's stench is coming from within her, she can fervently feel her "origin" and "conclusion" which irritates her a lot.
In other words, she is just as young emotionally as her appearance would suggest.


On the other hand, there are times when she shows a "motherly" something when it comes to the golden sword. If her likeability is raised, that motherly something will reveal itself in her interactions with her Master (although Medusa herself is unaware of it).



(1st Ascension)

Her mentally "young" portion is emphasized and it is easy to tell how she's feeling at the moment.

Without using any honorifics, she shows a fearless bluntness to those around her.

Her stance that she's "doing it because it's her job and there is a contract" remains the same, but in this form, she is more upfront about her discontent and doubts, and the professional-like part from her second and third ascensions is missing.

Conversely, that also makes her feel more true-to-life and easier to get along with.

...However, since she is not particularly sociable and has extreme likes and dislikes when it comes to people, she is not the type that can establish a relationship with anyone.


The "motherly nature" lurking at her foundation did not change.

Even with her brusque attitude, she treasures the sword and the monsters that were born from him, and perhaps the Master that became a target of protection from raising their likeability with her is included in there too.
4:
• Riding: A

She can handle any monster or vehicle as she wishes, with the exception of Phantasmal and Divine Beasts.

It should be noted that this Saber-class version does not possess the "Bridle of Chivalry".


Breaker Gorgon: Self Seal - Dark Temple B

Breaker Gorgon. Her original Noble Phantasm.

A barrier that shows nightmares and is of the "sealing" orientation.

It can also be used as a fetter that seals away her Mystic Eyes.

In place of her Rider-class version's blindfold, it has been deployed as a pair of sunglasses or as the visor portion of a helmet for Saber Medusa.


• Factor Predation (Goddess of War): EX

This version of Medusa possesses a shield, helmet, and armor reminiscent of the Goddess of War.

Although the details are unsure, according to Chaldea's analysis - similar to how there is a Medusa of a different class possessing the immortal-killing scythe - this may be the result of some ability to incorporate "elements similar to their cause of death".
5:
『The Golden Sword of Monsters』

Rank: A

Classification: Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 1~40

Maximum number of targets: 200


Chrysaor.

It is the name of the being that emerged from the dead Medusa's blood, grasping a golden sword from his birth───the "Father of Monsters" who became the ancestor of countless Demonic Beasts.

Upon releasing the True Name of the golden sword in which that power resides - or what may be the power "itself - even the slashes will be imbued with the attribute of the "Father of Monsters". In other words, the true value of this sword is "a slash that births monsters" or "a slash that is a monster".


With each swing, monsters shaped by a golden light (e.g. Echidna, Cerberus) are spawned from the sword, which - like creatures fathered by the golden sword - obediently listen to commands; or perhaps they just autonomously attack the enemy.

These golden monsters will dissipate over time, but since they are also sword flashes, it is possible for them to turn back into golden magical slashes at any time.
6:
Her destiny was derailed by the despicable curse of the gods, she lost everything she loved, degraded into a monster, and had her head sent flying by an undisputed hero; what she gave birth to in her last moments───


They were Pegasus and Chrysaor.

The heavenly steed dancing in the sky and the father of monsters.


The one who is forever free and the one who will continue their lineage for eternity.


That might have been the wish of her who was left all alone at the end.


To the beloved family that is gone now.


I wanted us to be free.

I wanted it to last forever.


───One day.


May that freedom and eternity unite us once more.

本人的作风虽然是『和至今为止相比并没有什么变化的冬之女王的作风』、并坚信如此，但不管怎么看都比平时要更放松、兴致更高昂（内心更雀跃）了。
尽管还维持着冷静的言行举止，但比起女王的一面，少女的一面更加强烈突出。与平时相比宽于规矩和礼仪，这个她就算面对御主或芭万·希的疏忽也会露出温柔的微笑。
旁观的巴格斯特则表示「反而有点吓人了」。

　　　◆

听说灵子转移的目的地是南国度假地的摩根确信了，「这毫无疑问是蜜月旅行。真是很有吾夫/妻风范的，十分有品位的提案呢」。
虽然外表还是一如既往的冷淡表情，但摩根陛下的内心早已雀跃起来了。
事件解决之后，听到御主带着笑容说道
「这次的特异点也平安解决了呢！」，
摩根陛下才两眼发直，大受震撼：
「诶……不是蜜月旅行的吗？」

话虽如此，在布里斯汀度过的夏天
也已经化作了闪闪发光的记忆，让她的魔术又新添了一本书。
2:
○雨之国的妖精：A
作为雨之国的魔女的技能。
很有虽然具备知识却不曾见识过外界的深闺小姐一样，
求知欲旺盛，对不曾见过的事物、无法预测的存在抱有好意的她的风范的技能。
拥有“自己的行动一定是正确的”这样明了的确信。

○逆境的魅力：A
救世的妖精，救世主梣往往会在贫弱、受苦的妖精们面前显现，并逆转其身处的劣势。
而这就是那身处逆境中依然有力地奋起，打倒强敌的身姿，对于饱受苦楚的存在们来说就是希望本身一事的映照。
表现在通常的『领袖魅力』上，就是梣还会在此基础上发生追加效果。

Memory of Londinium
救世主梣曾在梦中得见的，理想乡伦蒂尼恩的残骸。制造出现在、过去、未来，原本应当在那片土地上集结的骑士们的光辉闪耀的武器，并令其如雾般消散。

4:
・救世主梣
在不列颠马不停蹄地介入着氏族间的争端，拯救着饱受苦楚的下级妖精们，逐渐打响名号的时期的『乐园妖精』。
因为名号从『魔女』变作了『救世主』，这一时期开始，她就以“梣”自称了。
因为是从义母——雨之国的王妃——那里得到的重要的名字，所以并不想在被认作『恶人』的时候使用。

性格就是该严厉的时候严厉，
该让大家安心的时候就柔和的类型。
虽然与引导玛修的梣是同一存在，但比起那时来说攻击性略高。
大概，算是介于雨之魔女和救世主之间的状态吧。
强烈地宣誓“自己这样的行动就是正确的”，绝对不容许包含自己的心在内的一切来自他人的背叛。

・救世主梣
在不列颠马不停蹄地介入着氏族间的争端，拯救着饱受苦楚的下级妖精们，逐渐打响名号的时期的『乐园妖精』。
因为名号从『魔女』变作了『救世主』，这一时期开始，她就以“梣”自称了。
因为是从义母——雨之国的王妃——那里得到的重要的名字，所以并不想在被认作『恶人』的时候使用。

心底不断为奥克尼被毁灭的愤怒和憎恨所焦灼，但她生来具有的正义感、公正性以及内心的强韧压制了这些负面情绪，梣还是成为了一位优秀的救世主。
对于弱小的妖精们，以及被当作奴隶驱使的人类们而言就是『希望』本身的梣，不断平定着各地的纷争，逐渐组织起了『圆桌』，调停了彼此相争的妖精氏族，为建造属于人类们的都市伦蒂尼恩贡献了力量，终于统一了不列颠，迎来了不列颠的最初的王。

5:
・雨之国的魔女的故事（Ⅰ）
漂流到奥克尼的『乐园妖精』。
那最为纯粹无垢的姿态。

奥克尼是『雨之氏族』统治的国度，
而『雨之氏族』虽然惧怕『乐园妖精』显现一事导致本族的罪孽被揭露，却还是对尚为婴儿的摩根心生怜悯，选择了从别的氏族手中守护摩根的道路。
虽然奥克尼因地处最北端，相比其他氏族的国家更为贫乏，不够繁荣，但也是一个因此而宁静安稳的国度。
在这世界尽头的奥克尼中，耸立着巨大的世界树，一年里的大半时间都在下雨。

『雨之氏族』的王妃将摩根当作女儿抚养，最后还为她取了和世界树一样的名字——『梣』。
将她当作『女儿』抚养，并非是为了拉拢。
只是为了终将会以『乐园妖精』的身份踏上旅程的摩根不对不列颠的种种感到困惑，想要把各种各样的知识教给她、并为她创造回忆。
摩根理解着自己名为『终结不列颠』的使命，感念着『雨之氏族』们的温柔心意，率真地成长起来。

没有一个人在的图书室，是摩根最喜欢的地方。
透过窗户，她能看到灰蒙蒙的天空。听到温柔的雨水滴答声。
在许多的藏书当中，摩根开始摸索起并非让不列颠走向终结，而是重新开始的——拯救饱受罪孽感折磨的妖精们的手段。

在幽暗却温暖的图书室中。
如同坐在桌前读着童话的孩童一般，她在梦里描绘着『理想的国度』。

・雨之国的魔女的故事（Ⅰ）
摩根是为了纠正不列颠的错误，由乐园阿瓦隆派遣到地上的『乐园妖精』。
还是婴儿（幼体）状态的摩根从乐园一直漂流到了不列颠的最北端，奥克尼。
奥克尼是『雨之氏族』统治的国度，而『雨之氏族』虽然惧怕『乐园妖精』显现一事导致本族的罪孽被揭露，却还是对尚为婴儿的摩根心生怜悯，选择了从别的氏族手中守护摩根的道路。

6:
・雨之国的魔女的故事（Ⅱ）
然而，在她满16岁的那天，奥克尼被毁灭了。
害怕被『乐园妖精』定罪的其他氏族组成了同盟，攻入了奥克尼。
奥克尼陷入一片火海，『雨之氏族』被屠杀殆尽，被他们藏匿起来的『乐园妖精』也被发现，随后被处刑。
在那时被抓住的『乐园妖精』，其实是奥克尼的王妃的亲生女儿，这位女儿直到最后仍然挂念着摩根的未来，为了她挺身而出。

因为『雨之氏族』一众最后的抵抗而幸存的摩根，为了将『雨之氏族』托付给自己的愿望——让不列颠成为没有争斗的和平国度——付诸现实，压下了对其他氏族的憎恨，作为『救世的妖精』离开了亡国的奥克尼，前往不列颠本土。

刚来到本土的时候，她因为失去了奥克尼的悲痛，双目无神，漫无目的地流浪，自然也有了不良行为。

「『雨之氏族』以外的妖精我全都讨厌。
　虽然我要为了消除不列颠的纷争行动，
　但这也不意味着我希望妖精们幸福。
　想要我的助力，就献上比生命更贵重的代价吧。」
 
像这样，变成了童话里登场的『坏魔女』模式。
不过，在经历了千年旅途以后，能够交托信任的伙伴有所增加，目的也变得明确，她也就从『坏魔女』模式毕业了。因为本人原本也就是装出一副坏坏的样子，不用装了可算神清气爽了。

魔女梣的故事，到这里就结束了。
接下来的，就是救世主梣的故事了。

Source: Arthurian Mythos, history of English fae, and Lostbelt Britain.

Region: Orkney at the edges of the world

Alignment (1st Ascension): Lawful Good

Alignment (2nd Ascension): Lawful Neutral

Alignment (3rd Ascension): Lawful Summer

Attribute: Earth

Gender: Female


Since the Rain Witch, the Savior, and the Queen of the Lake are all her, she changes alignments with each Saint Graph. Being Lawful is the only part she's unwavering about.


The 3rd Ascension is Queen Morgan after her summon to Chaldea, changed into her swimsuitQueensuit due to a certain incident. She confidently believes she's still behaving as the usual Queen of Winter, same as always, but she's visibly more relaxed and in higher spirits. Despite the cold conduct, her girly side is showing more than her queenly side. She's not as strict as usual about manners and discipline, and responds to Master's and Baobhan Sith's blunders with a kind smile.

"She's scarier like this" - Barghest watching from the sidelines.
2:
• Faerie From The Land of Rain: A

Her Skill as the witch from the land of rain.

A Skill very characteristic of her personality. She's a sheltered princess full of knowledge but ignorant of the reality of the world outside, having an avid thirst for knowledge, and a strong liking for things she's never seen before and that surpass her imagination. She has a cheerful confidence that her actions are righteous.


• Charisma Under Adversity: A

The faerie of salvation, Aesc the Savior, always appeared before the weak and tormented fae and turned the tables. She was at her most invigorated when facing adversity, and was the very image of hope in the tormented's eyes when they saw her defeat a powerful opponent. Aesc gains extra effects in addition to the usual Charisma fare.


• Last Resort: A

Her last resort. Her political capabilities as a queen being used to build a top-class resort hotel (Paradise). Her physically offensive Bounded Field.

The ruins of Londinium the Utopia as Aesc dreamed of. It produces and disperses the weapons of the knights past, present, and future that were supposed to have gathered in the celebrated land. Used in 1st and 2nd Ascensions.



『Summer Pool Dozmary (Hope hatches from the Water Mirror of summer)』

Type: A++

Rank: Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 10-70

Max. Targets: 300 people


The lake faerie is said to have given the king the Holy Sword and later collected it back. This Greater Magecraft uses this lake as a catalyst to manufacture a large quantity of pseudo-Holy Swords and scatter them. The lake that once gave birth to hope was converted into a weapons factory by the hands of the fierce queen. The Noble Phantasm's Rank is A++ out of competitiveness against King Arthur's A++ Noble Phantasm. The queen's own abilities are ranked lower than usual because she's forcing the rank up on the Noble Phantasm. Used in 3rd Ascension.

4:
• Aesc the Savior

The Avalon le Fae from when she intermediated the incessant wars between Clans, saved the tormented Lower Fae, and gained renown in Britain. That was when she adopted the name Aesc because she started being called "Savior" instead of "Witch". It was a cherished name given to her by her foster mother... the queen of the land of rain... and she didn't want to use it while she was being perceived as the bad guy.


Her personality is strict when she needs to be, and gentle when she needs to calm people down. She is the same Aesc that guided Mash, but slightly more aggressive than she was back then. Think of it as a middle ground between the Rain Witch and the Savior.

She fervently swears her actions are righteous, and can never forgive betrayal from anyone, including her own heart.

• Aesc the Savior

The Avalon le Fae from when she intermediated the incessant wars between Clans, saved the tormented Lower Fae, and gained renown in Britain. That was when she adopted the name Aesc because she started being called "Savior" instead of "Witch". It was a cherished name given to her by her foster mother... the queen of the land of rain... and she didn't want to use it while she was being perceived as the bad guy.


While deep inside she was burning with fury and hatred over the destruction of Orkney, she did an splendid job as the savior by suppressing the negative emotions with her innate sense of fairness and justice and her unwavering character. After becoming living hope for the weaker fae and the enslaved humans, Aesc went around suppressing conflicts in every land, until she eventually formed the Round Table, mediated the feud between Faerie Clans, helped with construction of the human capital Londinium, then finally unified Britain and prepared to welcome its first king.

5:
• The Story of the Witch from the Land of Rain (I)

The most innocent form of the Avalon le Fae who washed ashore in Orkney.


Orkney was the land governed by the Rain Clan, and while the Rain Clan feared how the Avalon le Fae's appearance would expose their sins, they took pity on how she was still just a baby and chose to protect her from the other Clans. Due to Orkney being in the northernmost corner of the map, it was poorer than the other Clans and didn't prosper much, but conversely, it was a calmer and more peaceful land. The giant World Tree at the tip of the world towered over Orkney and it rained there for most of the year.


The queen of the Rain Clan raised the girl as her own daughter, ultimately naming her Aesc, the same name as the World Tree. The "daughter" treatment wasn't meant to lure the girl to her side. The goal was to fill her with the fond memories and knowledge she'd need in her eventual journey as the Avalon le Fae. Despite being aware of her mission, she was impressed by the kind hearts of the Rain Clan and grew into a tender-hearted woman.


The young girl's favorite place was her secluded study. The gray sky visible from the window. The gentle sound of the raindrops. In this vast collection of books, she searched for an alternative solution to save the fae from their agonizing sin—not by ending Britain but by starting Britain anew.


Like a child sitting on a desk reading fairy tales, she dreamed of the "ideal nation" inside that gloomy but warm study.

• The Story of the Witch from the Land of Rain (I)

Morgan was the Avalon le Fae sent by the Paradise Avalon to right Britain's wrongs. Still as a baby, she drifted away from Paradise to the northernmost part of Britain.

6:
• The Story of the Witch from the Land of Rain (II)

However, on the girl's 16th birthday, Orkney fell to ruin. In fear of being condemned by the Avalon le Fae, the other Clans formed an alliance and invaded Orkney. The Rain Clan was slaughtered, Orkney was covered in flames, and the sheltered Avalon le Fae was discovered and executed. The "Avalon le Fae" they captured on this occasion was the Rain Queen's real daughter, and said daughter volunteered herself as the Avalon le Fae out of concern for Morgan's future.


After surviving due to the Rain Clan's final act of resistance, Morgan swallowed her hatred for the other Clans, parted ways with the ruined land of Orkney, and headed to mainland Britain as the Faerie of Salvation in order to make the Rain Clan's wish come true... To make Britain into a peaceful land with no conflict...


While traversing through mainland Britain, the sadness of losing Orkney made her into a sulking, dead-eyed delinquent.

"I hate all fae outside the Rain Clan. I'll do what it takes to free Britain from conflict, but I don't really want the fae to be happy. If they want my help, it's going to cost higher than their lives.", she posed like an evil witch out of a fairy tale.


Following her millennia of traveling, she grew out of her evil witch phase by finding a clear goal and more friends she could trust. And that was a weight off her shoulders since her bad-guy act was pretty forced.


That's the end of the story of Aesc the Witch. Next is the story of the Savior.

0:
为了解决发生在南国特异点的事件，
而改换灵基在夏天宣告出道的异闻带的魔术师。
通过将自己掌握的魔术变换为音乐和舞蹈的形式，
能够自如行使和以往一样，不，是超越以往的高难度魔术（本人自称）了。
——圣剑的守护者，
在这里成为了享受盛夏的一员。

「明明名字是卡斯特（Caster），职阶却是Berserker什么的，
　大家对我产生的疑惑可能都藏不住吧！」
 
在这般兴奋地说着这话的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特旁边，路过的芙芙神情毫不关心。
（特别意译：不，也没有……和平时一样啊……）
1:
身高／体重：154cm·42kg
出处：亚瑟王传说、Fate/Grand Order
地域：潮声的廷塔杰尔
属性：中立·善　　副属性：星　　性别：女性 
也算是不言自明的事情了，职阶是Berserker是出于针对摩根的对抗意识。
第三灵基的姿态是『圣剑守护者』，有着A·A之名。

通常状态的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特和A·A虽然可以说是『同一存在』的关系，但仅限本次，『阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特』和『A·A』被彻底地分立，作为不同的个体各自进行着活动。
2:
○性格
基本上来说就是平时的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特，但因为身在度假地，情绪变得更加高涨了。
尽管至今为止总是就算有『感觉很有意思的事情』『想做的事情』也容易因「但是，反正我这样的人就算做了也会失败……」的想法而踌躇不前，但这一次却变得像「挺好的呀，试试看吧！　就算要失败也等失败了再说！」这样积极向上起来。也就是变成了没有刹车的状态。
也可以说她本来就是个野丫头，只不过现在那股子横冲直撞的劲头更不加掩饰了。

第一灵基是是身着休闲泳装破解夏威托莉雅之谜的名侦探角色，
第二灵基是发生了各种各样的事情以后被迫换上的奇异国度风格，
而第三灵基，则是念叨着「毕竟是夏天，似乎也有灾害横行，没办法嘛」，心里则露出自信满满表情的A·A。

就算变成了Berserker，所习得的魔术也依然健在，
时而如舞女一般活动身躯，
时而令一众使魔发动突击，
时而好像猛然想起来了一样以魔术产物主导夏日的战斗。

　　　◆
   
○对魔力：B
因为变成了Berserker，对魔力的阶级似乎有所下降。

○道具作成：E
因判明其只能制作出破坏工作范畴的事物，
阶级显著低下。
这是世界认证。
3:
○狂化：A
虽然阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特非常温和，A·A更是理性的化身，
但她却持有高阶级的狂化技能。
这虽然是十分令人费解的事情，但在本应是理性化身的A·A会因为「毕竟是夏天」这样的理由而放弃职责的时候，你就该察觉到这次是怎样的异常事态了。
而阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特这边，则是在第二灵基正式获得了狂化技能。

○妖精眼：？
并非人类拥有的魔眼，而是妖精与生俱来的『切换世界』的视野。
高位妖精拥有的妖精眼被誉为能看穿所有谎言、映照真相之眼。

○春之悸动：EX
通常状态的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特的第一技能因夏天的解放感而发生了变化的产物。
从支援队伍全体的技能变成了强化阿尔托莉雅自己的技能。
总而言之就是开心！战斗啊度假啊都超有意思！

○夏之妖精：B
通常状态的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特的第二技能因职阶转换而发生了变化的产物。
话虽如此，但和其他技能不同，唯独这个技能似乎没什么变化。向周身播撒夏日的欢乐，也称为假日妖精。
4:
『连接宿愿的希望之剑』
阶级：A+　种类：对神宝具
有效范围：1～90　最大捕捉：1尊

Hope Will Camelot
过去建造在妖精国不列颠的罪之都卡美洛中的护国之枪，伦戈米尼亚德。
将其术式再现的对灾厄肃正宝具。是在异闻带不列颠中用于祓除咒之灾厄的术式。誓约胜利之剑与闪耀于终焉之枪的重叠技。
原本自其魔力量中产生的爆发足以波及广阔的地域，但毕竟是将对象限定为『1尊』，不会造成其他损失的高度结界魔术。
对『混沌』『神性』『人类的威胁』特攻。
唯有在使用这个宝具时，她不再沉浸在夏日的明朗氛围中，而是会化作纯度100%的『预言之子』，成为『圣剑守护者』。

○圣剑操纵：A
将从圣剑中摘出的使魔进行强化的技能。
『圣剑铸造』的个人专属版本。
即便是身为圣剑概念守护人理的A·A，
成为Berserker后也只会强化自己了。
战斗时出现的使魔都是基于圣剑的基型（Essence）制作的，
所以各自有着如下对应：
虎鲸：十拳剑 名为埃克托。
金雕：米斯特汀 名为马赫。
5:
○性格（A·A）
基本上就是平时的A·A，但因为身在度假地&第一次出演幕后黑手，情绪高涨到奇怪起来了。
保持着作为守护者的理性和平静，为人公正，作为原乐园妖精中意保持淑女，决不饶恕邪恶的A·A已经“死”在了海滨（夏天）。
她创办了从者庆典正常化委员会，并任命村正为保镖，在夏威托莉雅各地视察，据说那乐在其中的姿态实在不能让熟人看到。
A·A除了DAY1以外都不在总部也是这个缘故。
之后阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特知道了便大为光火。
6:
事情的开端是BB所创造的特异点。
感知到新的南国特异点的异常的A·A为了解决问题，自己参与进从者庆典系统的运营方，
将阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特作为和御主一同解决事态的当事人送了出去。

A·A虽然知晓特异点的问题所在，也就是大精灵旺吉娜（Wandjina）的叹息，但却没有和阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特共享情报，将她以只是『和朋友们一同享受夏天的少女』的形式分离开来。
祈愿着这样的做法无论对她还是对旺吉娜都能取得一个好的结果。

就这样，一无所知的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特和御主一起，意气风发地向夏威托莉雅进行了灵子转移。
克服了许许多多的冒险和风波，最后平安无事地抵达了南国的圆满结局。

一切都无比耀眼的，不同于妖精国的时光。
——夏之记忆，就如同这般。

0:
To resolve the incident occurring in the tropical Singularity, this Mage from a Lostbelt altered her Saint Graph and made her Summer debut.

She says that she has become able to freely utilize spells of similar, nay, of even harder difficulty (according to her) than before by converting the Magecraft she mastered into music and dancing.

────The Guardian of the Holy Sword is here to enjoy the heights of Summer.


"The others might be unable to conceal their doubts about me what with me ending up in the Berserker class despite Caster being my name!"


With an exasperated look on his face, Fou-kun passes by the happily talking Arcas.

(What his expression meant: No, not really...you're the same as always...)
1:
Height/Weight: 154cm/42kg

Source: Arthurian legends, Fate/Grand Order

Location: Tintagel of the Roaring Sea

Alignment: Neutral Good

Attribute: Star

Gender: Female

It goes without saying that her class is Berserker out of her rivalry with Morgan.

Her form in her third ascension is the "Guardian of the Holy Sword" and is named A・A.


The usual Artoria Caster and A・A are "the same person", but, this time only, they have fully split into "Artoria Caster" and "A・A" and each one operates as a separate individual.
2:
• Personality

Basically, she's the usual Artoria Caster, but due to being at a resort, she's more high-tension.

Before this, even if she found something fun or had something that she wanted to try doing, she tended to hesitate, thinking that someone like her would surely make a blunder. However, this time she's acting positive going "That looks nice, let's give it a go! If I mess up, that's how the cookie crumbled!". Her brakes have disappeared.

You could also say that she's no longer able to hide her tomboyish true nature where she rushes headlong at things.


The first ascension is the famous detective clad in a casual swimsuit who unravels Hawatolia's mysteries; the Wonderland-specific second ascension where she was forced to change her outfit due to all sorts of reasons; and lastly, the third ascension of A・A, who - while going "Since it's Summer and it seems disasters will be occurring, I have no choice" - feels all smug on the inside.


Even though she became a Berserker, the magecraft she's learned is perfectly fine, her body moves like that of a dancer from time to time, occasionally forces her familiars to charge at the enemy, and sometimes takes the lead of the Summer battles by using magically created items that she seemed to have just remembered were in her possession.


◆


• Magic Resistance: B

Her Magic Resistance seemed to have become weaker after becoming a Berserker.


• Item Construction: E

Since it has been ascertained that she can only make things suited for sabotage, the skill's rank has been considerably lowered. This is globally acknowledged.
3:
○Madness Enhancement: A
Artoria Caster is very peaceful and A・A is a mass of rationality, yet she possesses a Madness Enhancement skill of high ranking.
While it may be a baffling story, I hope you can tell how abnormal this situation is from the fact that A・A, the supposed mass of rationality, goes and abandons her professional duties because - and I quote - "It's Summer".
As for Artoria Caster, she officially acquired the skill upon reaching her second ascension.

○Faerie Eyes: ?
It is not one of the Mystic Eyes that mortals can possess, but the field of vision possessed by the fae folk from birth that 'switches the world'.
The Faerie eyes held by high-ranking fae are said to be eyes that reflect the truth and can see through any lie.

○Spring Beat: EX
A skill that came to be through regular Artoria Caster's first skill being transformed by the sense of liberation of Summer. From a skill that supports the whole party to something that only strengthens Artoria.
Anyway, she's happy! Battles and vacations are both fun!

○Faerie of Summer: B
A skill that came to be through regular Artoria Caster's second skill being transformed by her class change.

However, unlike her other skills, this skill alone does not seem to have changed much. You could call her the Faerie of Vacations who spreads the fun of Summer to her surroundings.
4:
『The Sword of Hope That Pieces Together the Longstanding Desire』

Rank: A+

Classification: Anti-Divinity Noble Phantasm

Range: 1~90

Max. number of targets: 1


Hopewill Camelot.

Rhongomyniad, the spear built in the Capital of Sin Camelot to protect the Land of the Fae Britain.

This Anti-Calamity and Anti-Purge Noble Phantasm reenacts that ritual. It is what was used to cleanse the Calamity of Curses in Lostbelt Britain. A combination technique of Excalibur and Rhongomyniad.

It is also an advanced boundary magecraft that is limited to a 'single' target that causes no harm to anything else even though normally the explosion would spread to a wide area due to the amount of mana it contains.

It deals bonus damage to those with 'Chaotic', 'Divine', and 'Threat to Humanity' traits.

Only when handling this Noble Phantasm does she not get carried away by the liveliness of Summer; she is the 100% pure 'Child of Prophecy' and becomes the 'Guardian of the Holy Sword'.


• Holy Sword Handling: A

A skill that strengthens the familiars that were extracted from the holy sword.

A version of the "Holy Sword Creation" that's only for Castoria.

Even if it's A・A who is the concept of the holy sword and the protector of the Human Order, having become a Berserker, she will only strengthen herself alone.

The familiars that appear during combat were created from the base forms (essences) of holy swords; the orca named Ector corresponds to Totsuka-no-Tsurugi and the golden eagle named Mach corresponds to Mistilteinn.
5:
• Personality (A・A)

While she's fundamentally the normal A・A, her tension is a bit strange due to being at a tropical resort and standing on the mastermind side for the first time.

As a guardian, she's an impartial individual who always maintains her rationality and composure while as a former Faerie of Paradise, she likes being ladylike and has no mercy for evil; such an A・A has died on the beach (in Summer).

They say her appearance as she enjoyed herself establishing the ServaFes Normalization Committee, appointing Muramasa as a bodyguard, and touring the various locations of Hawatolia was really not something she could let her acquaintances see.

This is why she was only at her headquarters on Day 1.

When Arcas found out later, she was really pissed.
6:
The starting point of everything was the singularity created by BB.

A・A noticed the abnormality of the new tropical singularity and in order to solve it, she went to the ServaFes' system management side and sent off Artoria Caster to resolve the situation with the Master.


Although A・A was aware of the singularity's problem and Wandjina's laments, she did not share that information with Artoria Caster, separating her from herself simply as a 'young girl enjoying herself with her friends'.

She hoped it would result in a good outcome for both Castoria and Wandjina.


Thus, knowing nothing, Artoria Caster Rayshifted to Hawatolia with the Master in high spirits.

Overcoming several adventures and troubles, they safely reached the happy ending in the tropics.


Days where everything was bright and promising, which she could never experience in the Land of the Fae.

────That is how she'll remember this Summer.

铃鹿一度十分烦恼。
要当圣诞老人吗……还是要穿上泳装呢……
适合JK的东西未免太多了些。
这样的她最后得出的答案，就是纵情享受夏日！！
也就是说，这正是「铃鹿御前〔暑假〕」——

虽说铃鹿御前原本就拥有Rider职阶的适应性，但因为
夏天的奔放感！　有奔放感的骑乘物！
想吹风！　那果然就是这个了！
……这样的来龙去脉而最终选择了摩托车。
毕竟机会难得，也就顺便变成了赛车女王式的打扮。
正可谓一石二鸟。

「等着吧夏天，我就要来啦！！」
1:
身高／体重：164cm·51kg
出处：铃鹿草子、田村三代记，等等
地域：日本
属性：中立·夏　　副属性：天　　性别：女性
「夏天和黑皮辣妹的相性超棒的吧？」
2:
○性格
基本上就是平时的铃鹿御前。
不再将原本认真严谨又深思熟虑的性格表现在外，而向任性又莽撞的辣妹风女高中生的形象看齐。
只不过，由于其根本性质还是侍奉体质，也有虽然看起来是任性的行为举止，实际上却是为了对方好的情况。

变成了泳装形态的铃鹿御前心情会更为奔放，虽然有一定误差，但思考方式也会变得相较Saber状态更加倾向于自我本位。
顺带一提，如果是变成了圣诞老人的情况，其侍奉体质会更加突出地表现在外。


○动机·对御主的态度（前篇）
铃鹿御前的目的是「想要恋爱」「为了恋爱而磨练自己、追求美」。
也就是说，泳装灵基对她来说恰到好处。
因相较平时更为奔放的心情而跃跃欲试，以独占整片海滩的视线为目标。
敌人（其他泳装从者）都很强哦，千万不要气馁啊铃鹿。

——这样看来目的虽然和Saber的她相比没什么变化，
但在穿着泳装时，还有一个大前提。

「要认真地纵情享受，这个夏天。」

也就是说，恋爱也好，自我磨练也好，都包含在夏天里了。
心中雀跃着对恋爱的期待，和朋友们一同度过夏日时光。
就算最后没能收获恋情，铃鹿御前也会将其作为闪闪发光的珍重的夏日回忆予以接受吧。
3:
○对魔力：D
无效化藉由一工程（Single Action）的咏唱行使的魔术。相当于回避魔力的护身符程度的对魔力。
和Saber时相比阶级发生了相当程度的下降。
据本人主张，是表现了想要被夏日的魔力幻惑，想要沉醉其中……这样的意愿。

○骑乘：A
骑乘的才能。
能够自如地操纵幻兽、神兽等级以外的一切骑乘物。野兽就靠魔眼驯服，乘具就靠神通力驾驭。
也能够自如地操纵浮具。这就是所谓浮具操作。

○神性：A
对于其身体究竟是否具备神性属性的判定。
为了独占海滩的视线不择手段。
连神之威光都加以利用，在海滩上显现出分外华丽耀眼的容姿。
另外，第三再临时，以太阳为模板的羽衣在物理层面上十分光辉刺目，无比显眼。
因为收到了投诉，所以平时会调低发光量级。
本人对此多少有些沮丧。

○阵地建造：C
快快让开快快让开，铃鹿通行。
这片海岸就是属于我的闪耀舞台！
……以这样的觉悟和势头获得了阵地建造的技能。
非常自我任性的技能，毕竟这是原本的铃鹿御前很难获得的能力。
可以说是被夏日的魔力所幻惑的成果。
4:
○BF·超级夏日：EX
技能『沙滩之花』的2023年版。
能够在海边聚集起人们视线的阳之力。
会从通常的沙滩之花发生进化，是出于对泳装玉藻的竞争意识。

○神通力（夏）：A
神之力的一部分。能随心所欲移动周围的物体。
配合夏天的奔放感，趁着混乱把阶级提升到了A。总归是想办法做到了。
会变成（夏）也是因为那时的影响吗。

○夏日旗帜：B
以赛车女王的身份挥舞旗帜的舞台，就是铃鹿闪耀舞台的证明。
正可谓是阵地建造的成果。
另外，
「不论如何我都是『立乌帽子』。
　不如说，只要是我的打扮，不管是什么
　都是『立乌帽子』风格嘛！」
因为铃鹿持有如上的主张，所以就算手上没有旗帜，甚至就算不打扮成赛车女王的形象也能够厚着脸皮发动技能。
真狡猾。
5:
『夏盛净土・光轮庭园』
阶级：A+　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：2~99　最大捕捉：50人

Natsumorijoudo Kourinteien
由铃鹿御前的爱车发动的超高速飞行突进贯穿“光”击。
在铃鹿突进之后，敌人就会被卷入七色的光芒当中。
在变换为泳装灵基时，作为向要在征服意义上表示敬意的国王大人、被誉为人类最速的Rider以及和自己一样现代化了的Rider征询意见的结果，
「果然最有Rider风范的宝具还是用骑乘物发动突击啊！
　要是再配上华丽的爆炸就更有看头了！」
最终得出了如上的激动人心的结论。
……也有以自拍为真正目的，顺便也能把敌人卷进去这样一石二鸟的想法在里面。

据说是她生前就中意的光轮车，但这次还掺入了太阳的要素。
闪闪发光的样子正可谓是游戏光轮车。
既能奔行于地，又能驰骋于天。而且令人惊叹的是，甚至还能在海上奔走，可谓万能牛车。

平时这架光轮车会和显明连剑组合，
组成超级运动用型号的机车。
其名为「KMR3000-MH」。
KMR是「显明连（KenMyouRen）」、MH是「真的 在发光（Maji Hikaru）」。
3000是因为和显明连剑的关联顺势加上的，和排量没有任何关系。说到底外表虽然是摩托机车，但动力其实是神通力。
6:
○动机·对御主的态度（后篇）
——话虽如此。
她对待御主的态度还是和Saber时没什么不同。
是个看起来任性实则顺从的从者。
在FGO中和Saber时的她一样，不会和御主发展恋爱关系。在「恋爱」之前好感度就已经达到最高了。
但因为铃鹿御前本人是距离感很近，容易发生亲密接触的类型，所以万望你注意不要误会。

用恋爱八卦把气氛炒热的话，就能一口气拉近和她的关系。

　　◆
  
在夏威托莉雅岛上，本来是兴致勃勃地要和御主一起在度假地尽情游玩的，却得知了御主在暗中接受了秘密任务，并出于责任感而要将其完成的事实，
「那样一来感觉就有哪里不对了」
她的心情便低落了起来。
虽然她原本是不打算帮御主完成任务的，但御主通过自白『自己也想好好享受一把夏天』的心情，让铃鹿御前的兴致也重新高涨起来，两人便一同为了解决特异点而开始活跃。

　　◆
  
最终，她以“夏日乃是吾之所有物”为由，
背负起了太阳。

「你不是想认真享受一把夏天嘛？
　那肯定少不了在天上耀武扬威的大太阳吧？
　也就是说，必须要由我来如太阳般闪耀光辉才行啦。

　啊——你是想说太阳和那个笨狐狸撞角色了？
　所以，我把那个太阳的角色定位拿到手了啊。
　贪婪？　不挺好的吗！
　所谓JK就是不论何时都这么任性的呀♪」

0:
那个从者庆典（ServaFes）回归了！
让人难以呼吸的蒸腾热力，以及甚至比之更胜一筹的创作热情。
啊啊，这次又会与怎样的作品邂逅呢……
虽然一边这么想着一边急不可耐地等待着，可不知为何，创作者们始终没有把原稿画好交上。

「太久没参加活动了，体力恐怕跟不上。明天再开始努力吧。」
「就算着急，梗的灵感也出不来。明天再开始努力吧。」
「倦怠了。今天先玩会儿游戏，明天再开始努力吧。」

克洛伊震怒了。
她下定决心，定要好好管教那奸诈暴虐的创作者。
于是克洛伊转换职阶，变成了复仇者……啊不，是编辑。
1:
身高／体重：133cm·29kg
出处：Fate/kaleid liner 魔法少女☆伊莉雅
地域：日本·冬木市
属性：混沌·善　　副属性：人　　性别：女性
「编辑所必需的力量，那就是……忍耐力！」
耐久的阶级会有A就是这么回事。
2:
自命为能干的美少女编辑的克洛伊。
担当起了制定日程、和印刷厂交涉、构筑企划，乃至饮食、日常起居等创作之外的一切杂务。
似乎已经把支持创作者，并将作品传递给读者一事视为自己的使命了。
尽管常常会被不听话的创作者们牵着鼻子走，但凭借其积极的思考和行动力，往往能够取得超出预计的结果。

为了能够成为连接起读者和创作者的桥梁，小不点儿编辑今天也在四处奔走。
3:
和通常状态的克洛伊（Archer）相比，稍微多了些管理对象的意欲。
原本她就会对有好感的对象产生竭尽全力、甚至是溺爱的倾向，但因Avenger职阶的缘故，这一特性似乎还发生了少许变化。

「你知道“番茄工作法”吗？
  25分钟的专注加5分钟的休息，如此反复。
  如果在中间再夹有长时间的休息……
  嗯，这样的话，一天能工作18个小时呢！」

创作者根本无处可逃。
4:
○进展如何了：B
向创作者询问进度的技能。这算技能吗？
对于依事前计划按部就班的创作者来说，只是单纯的进度确认，但对于工作迟延的创作者来说，就是致死性的咒语。
要从虚实交织的创作者模糊不清的回复中看出真相，并作出是要死命催稿还是要向印刷厂下跪道歉的判断。

○润色还来得及呢：D++
无论如何也赶不上原稿完成的时候，就先用临时的原稿作为样稿，在校样检查润色的环节再替换成完成版原稿的技能。
这样的润色替换可能会产生额外成本，也很容易发生事故，所以还是尽量避免为好。
尽管如此，据说这般恶行依然在某些地方横行肆虐……

○尊稿已收到！：A
结束所有原稿的检查工作，宣布校对完毕的技能。
“技能”算是什么啊。
对于创作者和编辑而言，这就是宣告工作结束的语句。但对于印刷厂来说，这就是机械运转的开战宣言。
5:
『传递给你，五彩斑斓的白与黑』
阶级：B++　种类：对人宝具
有效范围：1～10　最大捕捉：1人

Monochrome Impulse
让克洛伊通过漫画获得的种种感情，以黑白冲击的形式迸发出来。
发动时，克洛伊的主观世界的描写形态将变为单色，并以『零碎』的形式不连续地发生。
宛如漫画的分镜画面一般，仅剪切出攻击到敌人的瞬间。
当解除时，攻击便会化作现实，发生由事象重叠引发的大爆炸。

比起动作的连贯性和整合性，克洛伊似乎更中意用关键的高潮分镜来吸引读者那一派的漫画作品。
6:
克洛伊不会画画，也不会写故事。
由此，她对创作充满了敬意和憧憬。
创作者为了做出更好的作品会做任何事。
跨越了创作的艰苦而诞生的作品，一定会打动某人的心。
从某种意义上说，她或许比创作者更相信作品所拥有的力量。

但是，这样耗费灵魂所面世的东西，未必能被读者所接受。
那就是以『燃烧』的形式出现的灾害。
成为火种的作品，被黑暗的感情所烧却，化为灰烬。
其中的感情烟消云散，然后总有一天会被遗忘。
知道了那样的未来的克洛伊，在绝望中变容了。

编辑之灾害——危险野兽（Dangerous Beast）。

……为什么？
顺带一提，先行抵达夏威托莉雅的伊莉雅玩了好几十天，原稿完全没有进展，或许也是变容的原因。

　　　◆

本人表示完全没有作为『兽神克洛伊大人』的记忆。实在太可怜所以不要再提为好。

战胜了长久支配着妖精国的摩根，作为下一任女王迎来了加冕仪式的年轻女王。
企盼已久的约定，这样一来就实现了。
终于不再是『上代的继承者』，而是能够开始自己的人生了。在竞争对手阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特的祝福中，她前往了加冕仪式。

哎呀，妖精国的故事姑且放在一边吧。
这样的她，以从者的姿态现身了！
御主陷入了困惑。阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特也两眼发直。
外表也一致，言行举止更是（意外地）一致，
但，她果真就是那个{{着重|她}}吗——

在重重谜团包裹下，于南国的乐园举办的第二次从者夏日庆典就这样拉开了帷幕。

2:
○融化之心：A
将喷涌而出的心形魔力作为活力药剂，并强硬地付与对象。光是在场似乎就能够提升队伍全体的干劲之类的东西。甜味的领袖魅力。

○女王的契约：A
队伍全体的宝具威力提升（3回合）+付与异常状态『我美丽的战士（My Fair Soldier）』。
成为了『我美丽的战士』者会获得『技能封印』『攻击力、防御力大幅提升』的状态。因为是异常状态，所以会被持有对魔力的对象弹开。

○女王之墓：A
和女王梅芙持有的『女王的躯体』似是而非的技能。
完美的肉体、无瑕的美貌。能付与自身弱化无效状态，并每回合回复HP和NP，还能为『我美丽的战士』状态下的同伴增加NP。

○VVV：A
Violence Violin Voltage。
达到究极境界的演奏技艺，有时也能成为单纯的钝器。
因重击敌人而回响起来的小提琴的音色，于己方而言也会成为可怖的声响，会打乱精密的作业。
是与伊丽莎白的超声波攻击似是而非的攻击性音乐。
虽然能为对象付与『昏迷』『防御力下降』的状态，但友方的Arts指令卡也会被封印。
只不过，阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特是不会被封印Arts指令卡的例外。
3:
『永久机关·妖精帝国』
阶级：EX　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：1~50　最大捕捉：50人

Queen's Melty Heart
舍弃至今为止过度使用的身体，以全新的身体重生的转生仪式。
将大妖精麦布所做过的事情简易化的产物。古旧的肉体会就这样作为守护女王都市的魔力寄宿于大地之中，而新生的诺克娜蕾会将至今为止受过的伤势或诅咒重置，恢复到万全的状态。
转生时，会在心脏（新生体）中进行魔力压缩，而将周围搅得七零八落的余波则是小赠品。
「还望居住在女王都市的各位居民，在
　诺克娜蕾大人新生之时能锁好门窗，

○南天之星：EX
“雅兰杜（Yaraan-doo）”，是澳大利亚原住民神话中对南十字星的称呼。
诺克娜蕾虽然并非自宇宙而来的生命体，但却成为了『自地球所见的南十字星』的化身。
因接受了人类藉由南十字星所发展出的事物（航海技术、文化）的恩惠，而以拟似Foreigner的形式成立了。
「当然，身为王之氏族的神秘也还有留存啦。
　运用起来会很困难，要多加注意哦♡」
4:
○性格
外向，处世主动。
自信满满的表情、态度是她性格的表现。
对于善良和邪恶，她的看法就是『因人而异吧』，但绝不认同和饶恕丑恶之物。
对于诺克娜蕾而言，丑恶之物就是
『不思考自己的价值所在，也不想提升自己的价值的人』
『以他人的努力为食粮，糟蹋他人努力的人』，
当然，还有
『妨碍诺克娜蕾的人』。
她是个完美主义者，任何事情都绝不会偷工减料。严以律己，也严以待人，但绝不会轻视他人。
会为不够努力的人设定必要限度的课题，
将能力不适配的人分配到需要他的地方。
坚信着自己的职责和责任是『至高的』，为此会完成一切必要之事。不会将自己的努力表现在外的努力家。

聪明伶俐（头脑转得很快），
开朗快活（无所畏惧），
爆发惊人（行动时不按常理出牌）三方面俱全，
这是挚友阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特的说法。

女王梅芙以折磨对手为乐，
所以会对败者穷追不舍，
而诺克娜蕾会把自己的喜悦抛在脑后，所以并不会对敌人穷追猛打。

虽然女王梅芙也是努力家和行动派的性格，但说到底梅芙的本质是『以自己快乐为首要』。
确信着「对自己而言最好的状态，对国家而言也一定是最好的」，并加以实行。
而诺克娜蕾正好与之相对，是为了国家而不断磨练自己的妖精。二者的言行虽然看来一致，但在这一点上是完全相反的。
当完成了为自己定下的『使命』时，诺克娜蕾也会和女王梅芙一样，去享受『以自己为优先』的生活方式吧。
5:
○在第2部第6章 妖精国
在妖精国不列颠中，是作为『王之氏族』统治着北方妖精们的大妖精。
上代大妖精麦布的继承者。
意识到自己的死期的麦布将自己的『躯体』变作了都市，建成了北方妖精之都·爱丁堡。
而自存续了数千年的『妖精们的腐殖土』中，
诺克娜蕾诞生了。

作为大妖精麦布的复制体（克隆）而生的诺克娜蕾，不单是将守护北方妖精，甚至是将守护整个妖精国不列颠都视为了自己的『使命』。

在诸多牺牲之下诞生的诺克娜蕾坚决地起誓，在建造出理想国度之前，都不会追求自己的人生。
诺克娜蕾一边憧憬着恋情，又一边将其封印，
在女王都市爱丁堡不断壮大着『王之氏族』的臣下群体。
在那时，她邂逅了和自己一样被使命束缚着的的妖精少女，阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特，两人十分意气相投。
变成了「我们谁能先完成使命，获得幸福呢」
这样的竞争对手的关系。
对诺克娜蕾而言，作为『麦布的继承者』的时光虽然辛苦，但身处与她同样的处境中却完全不会消沉挫败的阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特的存在成为了她唯一的救赎。
（虽然作为麦布的继承者的责任非常辛苦，但她并不讨厌。因为对自尊心极强的诺克娜蕾来说，这一使命也自有它的价值）
6:
本已在妖精国一度别离的诺克娜蕾以从者的身份出现了！
究竟是敌是友，还是委员长呢。
其真面目，就是货真价实的诺克娜蕾啦。

旺吉娜（Wandjina）是俯瞰着夏威托莉雅的大气层的大精灵。
圣剑守护者感知到了无法与人类沟通的她的诉求，将挚友作为『能够胜任旺吉娜与人类之间的中介人』介绍给了她。

虽说诺克娜蕾是不存在于泛人类史的妖精，
但选择并委托她，是出于A·A的个人愿望。
就算只是一时之形也好。
想要再一次，让她体验到盛大华丽的节庆，就是这样。

原本并未在泛人类史被认知为英灵的诺克娜蕾，就这样出现在了夏威托莉雅的土地上。

○动机·对御主的态度
对男性御主是『一见钟情』的状态。见到的第一眼就干脆利落地喜欢上了。
对女性御主是『超级合得来的朋友』的状态。「比一比我们谁能先拿下好男人吧！　要是你赢了的话，我就给你准备环游世界一周的机票！」这样的关系。

在「从者·夏日·庆典2023！」中登场时，虽然没有回想起在妖精国时的记忆，但仍然积极地和御主打好关系。
诺克娜蕾是憧憬着上代麦布的传奇恋情成长起来的，所以有着「这次一定要和人类结缘，获得超绝的幸福」这样的愿望。

作为女王摩根的随从之一，前来南国游玩的梅柳齐娜。
虽然去之前很不情愿，但一来到现场就因为突出的解放感而觉醒了野生本能（人生好快乐！必须得纵情玩耍！）和龙之宿命（和恋人创造最美好的回忆！）。

既然已经这样决定了，平时的Lancer职阶就多少不太合适了。
她换上了和度假相配的新职阶，做好了迎击御主的万全准备。
1:
身高／体重：147cm·20kg
出处：法国妖精史、梅柳齐娜传说
地域：昏暗沼泽
属性：中立·恶　　副属性：地　　性别：雌型
「我虽然不讨厌穿泳装，但游泳就算了。
　并不是不会游啦。但湖水和海水之间
　还是有水质差距的吧？」
2:
○性格
内向、处世主动。
将自己的想法藏在内心，并迅速完成该办之事的行动派。有洁癖，不好游玩，总是充满了紧绷感的少女骑士。

……这是Lancer（妖精骑士）时的梅柳齐娜，而这次的梅柳齐娜并不重视她身为骑士的职责。
不管怎么说，现在可是暑假啊。
南国的解放感掀飞了梅柳齐娜『自虐性』的部分，
让她『率直、害怕寂寞、善妒、自虐』的性格
变为了『率直、可靠、深谋远虑、积极行动』的性格（当然，旅行结束后会恢复原状的）。

相比通常状态的梅柳齐娜，笑容和笑声都变多了，
也变得能够关心他人了，
因为变得游刃有余起来，所以为了展现自己的厉害之处，
会积极地帮助（Rescue）他人。

第一~第二灵基时是以度过夏日的妖精身份，
而第三灵基则是以守护夏日治安的凛然之龙的身份活跃。
3:
○对魔力：B
不管是哪个职阶，妖精骑士都拥有强大的对魔力。

○阵地建造：—
因为以空中为寝床（巢穴）一事，从将环境转化为『阴郁的林中湖泊』的特性中脱离了。

○妖精骑士：C
被选为妖精守护者所有的加护。
是对人、对文明专精的自我强化，但对其他『妖精骑士』的攻击行为被视为禁忌，杀害妖精骑士的妖精骑士将会自我崩溃。
……话虽如此，这次因为是度假期间，程度缓和了很多。

○骑乘：A+
梅柳齐娜本身虽然并未为了在空中飞翔而『骑乘某物』，但以高机动战斗妖精的身份获得了骑乘技能。新装备上的翅膀（妖精载装）本身就是她的骑乘物。
4:
○妖精载装：A
在度假地，绝不会让出现伤员、遇难者等等的状况发生。
要问为什么，那当然是因为这样的话和恋人的度假生活就要泡汤了。
自称很会看情况的非常强大的龙，不会单薄地夸耀自己的强大，而是将自己的双翼变形成了以海上战斗、救援行动为主要用途的形态。
在极具威慑力的机动性的基础上，还能做到救援（庇护）亟待救援者这样的事情呢。

○苍穹的武练：A
就算身在沙滩也不会松懈，刻印在身躯中的战斗技巧依然能够完全发挥出来。
虽然基本数值相较Lancer时的『佩里舞者』有所下降，但身在海边、水上和空中时就会变得更高。

○蓝色地平线：EX
对于向着长空开启征途者而言，
地平线和水平线并无差别。
将镌刻于『境界』的记录带变换为灵子，是阿尔比恩的超常能力。
复合了Lancer时的『光之地平线』的第一、第二和第三灵基的效果（当然，输出有所下降）的产物。
5:
『架起彩虹的无垢搏动』
阶级：B　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：40～80　最大捕捉：50人

Sprite Albion
将展开在外部的武装由妖精载装（Faerie Pack）转换为巨龙载装（Dragon Pack）后，从Storm Border起飞，向攻击对象解放所有火力的全武装攻击。
其飞行速度不知道是不是能轻易抵达10马赫呢。

「Border的改装成本是自费啦。
　你也知道，龙的外皮啊爪子啊泪水啊什么的
　都能当作魔力资源吧？　我就趁机会让达·芬奇
　高价收购啦」
6:
这是灵子转移后不久的事情。
摩根对因为没办法参加在夏威托莉雅举办的从者庆典（完全不会创作）而失落不已的梅柳齐娜这样说道。

「那去做救援活动（Rescue）如何？
　如果是你的双翼的话，不论是怎样的海难事故都能够解决。」
 
通过这个提案一举振作起来，梅柳齐娜开始作为夏威托莉雅唯一的海上保安骑士活动。
话虽如此，与生俱来的偷懒摸鱼的癖好还是没变，正午之前会在拉上窗帘的VIP室里小睡，午后则会在海滩上悠哉游哉地晒日光浴。
虽然因为讨厌海水而不会下海，但很喜欢和御主在浅水区打水仗。

这次她没有变身为龙，而是将资源用在自身以外的外部——也即用于生成各式各样的救援用具了。
因此装载了很多诸如导弹、滑水板、救急套装和外附单元之类的东西。

　　◆
  
作为摩根的代理参加了“地球人大赛（Earth Man Race）”。
摩根的常识认定了『梅柳齐娜获胜＝优胜奖品是摩根的囊中之物』，但梅柳齐娜根本就连代理的含义和立场都没有理解，自然而然地

「举办这样结局一目了然的大赛，
　还为我和御主的假期准备了这么多，
　摩根陛下的心胸真是宽广~☆」
这样想着，兴致高昂起来了。

因为最后由御主取得了优胜，这场悲剧的误会还没来得及被察觉一切就结束了，算是不幸中的万幸。

As one of Queen Morgan's retainers, Melusine came to the southern paradise to play around.

She was acting all unwilling before setting off, but as soon as they reached their destination, she awakened to her wild instincts (Life is so fun! You must enjoy yourself!) and the destiny of dragons (Create the best memories with your lover!).


Having decided so, her usual Lancer class was somewhat too boorish.

Having changed to a class more suitable for a vacation, she made perfect preparations for intercepting her Master.
1:
Height/Weight: 147cm/20kg

Source: French faerie history, Melusine's legends

Location: Dark Marsh

Alignment: Neutral Evil

Attribute: Earth

Gender: Female

"I don't hate swimsuits, but I refuse to swim. It's not like I can't swim. There's just a difference in water quality between a lake and a sea, right?"
2:
○Personality

Withdrawn, but active.

A go-getter who quickly performs what needs to be done while keeping her feelings to herself.

...that's how Melusine is as a Lancer (Faerie Knight), but the current Melusine attaches no importance to her position as a knight.

After all, she's on summer vacation.

The southern country's sense of liberation blew away Melusine's "self-torturing" part, changing her personality from "frank, lonely, deeply jealous and self-torturing" to "frank, reliable, thoughtful and energetic" (Of course, after the trip is over, she will return to the former).


She smiles and laughs more often than the usual Melusine, can show consideration for others, and, since she has the energy to spare, she is proactively working as a rescue-person to show off how great she is.

She is actively enjoying Summer as a faerie in her first and second ascensions and she's making great efforts as an imposing dragon protecting the public safety of Summer in her third ascension.
3:
○Magic Resistance B
Regardless of class, a Faerie Knight possesses powerful magic resistance.

○Territory Creation -
By using the sky as her bed (nest), she broke away from the special characteristic of turning her resting place into a "dreary forest lake".

○Faerie Knight C
The divine protection of being chosen as a protector of the fae folk.
It's a self-strengthening specialized for anti-unit and anti-civilization, but it forbids attacks against other "Faerie Knights" and a Faerie Knight that kills another Faerie Knight will destroy themselves.
...However since they are on a vacation right now, it has weakened considerably.

○Riding A
Since Melusine can fly in the air, she does not "ride" anything, however, as a highly mobile combat faerie, she possesses the Riding skill. Her newly-installed wings (Faerie Pack) are her "vehicle".
4:
○Faerie Pack A

No one should get injured or get into an accident in a resort.

After all, it would spoil Melusine's vacation with her lover.

The super-strong dragon who claims to be able to read the mood does not only boast of her strength; she also transformed her wings into ones that are mainly used for combat/relief activities at the sea.

In addition to her menacing mobility, she can also rescue (protect) those in need, you know.


○Azure Sky Arms Mastery A

She can perfectly display the combat techniques she has acquired without getting unsteady even on the sandy beach.

Its base values are lower than that of her Lancer version's "Perry Dancer", but it surpasses it on the beach, on the water, and in the sky.


○Blue Horizon EX

For a conqueror of the skies, the horizon of the land and the horizon of the waters are not that different.

Albion's outstanding ability to convert Record Belts carved into the "Boundary" into Spiritrons.

A combination of the effects of the first, second, and third Saint Graphs of her Lancer version's "Ley Horizon" (obviously, its output has been reduced).
5:
The Unspoiled Heartbeat That Builds A Rainbow

Rank: B

Classification: Anti-Army Noble Phantasm

Range: 40~80

Max. number of targets: 30


Sprite Albion.

An all-out attack from Melusine who took off from the Storm Border after replacing her externally deployed armaments from the Faerie Pack to the Dragon Pack and unleashed her full firepower on the target(s).

The attack's flight velocity may or may not easily reach Mach 10.

"The costs of remodeling the Border were paid by me. You know how things like a dragon's outer skin, claw, tears, etc. can be used as mana resources, right? I took my chance to sell them to Da Vinci at a high price, you see."
6:
This is something that happened right after we have finished Rayshifting.

Having become depressed from being unable to participate in the ServaFes being held on Hawatolia (she was completely hopeless at such creative activities), Morgan-sama told Melusine the following:

"Then, how about doing rescue activities? With your wings, you could solve any accident occurring on the sea."

Such a suggestion helped her recover immediately and Melusine become the one and only coast guard knight of Hawatolia.

However, her tendency to slack off remained unchanged; she spends her morning napping in the VIP room with the curtains drawn and lounges on the beach sunbathing in the afternoons.

She hates saltwater so she won't enter the sea, but she enjoys splashing water on each other with Master in the shallows.

This time, she does not transform into her dragon form, instead she switched to using those resources on the exterior───on creating all kinds of rescue implements.

That is why she has loads of external units such as missiles, water skis, and first-aid kits.


◆


It was as Morgan's representative that she entered the Earthman Race.

Morgan thought it would be common sense that Melusine's victory meant the victory prize would be Morgan's, but without even trying to comprehend what "representative" meant or what the position entailed, Melusine was genuinely elated that "Her Majesty Morgan is so generous to hold a race where the outcome is so clear just to arrange a vacation for Master and me~☆"

Master's victory of the race preventing this lamentable difference in understandings from being discovered was the only silver lining.
